opening_hours:
Mon–Thu 11:30 am–8:00 pm
Fri, Sat 11:30 am–9:00 pm
overview:
Piatto is a gathering place centered around a passion for fine food, fabulous wines, friends, and family. Come check out the gems we've come across over the years – diverse wines from across the globe, authentic Neapolitan wood-fired pizza, coffee, and fabulous desserts – all in a casual atmosphere with reasonable prices.


$15 LUNCH SPECIAL
AVAILABLE MON-SAT 11:30AM-4:00PM
Try any of our pizzas (9" lunch size) plus a lunch size soup or salad of your choice. This is a dine-in special. Take away lunch specials will include a $1 fee for packaging.

reviews.author: Brker
reviews.reviewBody: terrible service, food was ok.. first time going there for a special occasion. workers are inattentive!! food orders came to our table wrong...

reviews.author: Cass
reviews.reviewBody: We were there for our anniversary and we were not disappointed! The menu has changed since our last visit but everything on the menu sounded amazing. We had pizza and pasta for out main and shared the mozzarella balls. Everything was delicious! The atmosphere and staff are amazing. We will definitely be back!

reviews.author: CrystalT
reviews.reviewBody:
Great cozy spot and nice atmosphere. 
Server was very friendly and attentive.

reviews.author: MarkT
reviews.reviewBody: Always great!

reviews.author: Supper
reviews.reviewBody:
Salad and pizza were excellent. Service was excellent. 

Fried ravioli app was ok. Disappointed that my wine was served in a textured small water glass rather than a wine glass. Also warmed up the white wine.

reviews.author: GeorgeW
reviews.reviewBody: One of our favourites. Food is excellent and so is the service. We love to eat there when visiting Charlottetown. Favourite drink is  the Aperol.

reviews.author: MikeO
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, always great food. Wait staff were true pros.

reviews.author: sterling
reviews.reviewBody: Other than a the need for a little salt on the arancini the pizza was to die for

reviews.author: JaniceM
reviews.reviewBody: Keep coming back for the food. Prefer the atmosphere in Halifax.

reviews.author: Linda
reviews.reviewBody:
Excellent dinner with yummy salads and amazing pizzas!

Very friendly and helpful staff .. and live music!  

Definitely would recommend Piatto!

reviews.author: TeeGee
reviews.reviewBody: Good VPN pizza, as usual.  My negroni was a little off, but still passable.

reviews.author: Meeks
reviews.reviewBody: Great server and great pizza & drink recommendations.

reviews.author: TWRSSIDE
reviews.reviewBody: Great experience, we were there with our Sr. Parents and our waitress took the time to spend with them and that meant alot to them and us.  Food was excellent as always.

reviews.author: LAEC
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent service, super friendly staff! Food was great too

reviews.author: monique
reviews.reviewBody: We went twice this week (on vacation at PEI. Service exvellent

reviews.author: ValG
reviews.reviewBody: We liked the pizzas, local beer and desserts and it was a nice change from other places on our trip. The room was stunning and felt cosmopolitan as well as casual.

reviews.author: AmandaK
reviews.reviewBody: Always a great spot to eat.  We didn’t go at supper time so it was quieter than normal which is fine.  Great wine, food, espresso and dessert.

reviews.author: MarieM
reviews.reviewBody: Real Italian pizza! My friend as actually Italian and said it was authentic!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Vicki was fantastic!
Food was awesome!
Atmosphere was great!

reviews.author: DerrickF
reviews.reviewBody: Great quaint little place ! Nice atmosphere and amazing selection

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Slow service and the live music was too loud

reviews.author: JanetS
reviews.reviewBody: Our food came fast and tasted good. We would’ve appreciated refills of our drinks and a table a little further away from the main door.  We weren’t offered any Parmesan cheese or spicy oil like we’ve had in similar pizza places.

reviews.author: PierreP
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent pizza margarita , meatballs and spaghetti.

reviews.author: lynnm
reviews.reviewBody: The service was very good, food was good and hot. Would recommend reservations as very busy. A lot of people turned away.

reviews.author: NurC
reviews.reviewBody: Perfect service and good waitress were satisfied.

reviews.author: JimS
reviews.reviewBody: This has been on of our favorite restaurants in Charlottetown for several years, as we love their pizza. Perhaps due to the effects of the pandemic, but we found both the service and quality of the pizza to be at best average, and a pretty pricey average at that.

reviews.author: Sandra
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent pizza, the best in town actually. The service is excellent.

reviews.author: AmandaK
reviews.reviewBody: Service is always great and food is amazing.  Light, super tasty, great wine and amazing Espresso to end the evening.  We are never disappointed.

reviews.author: Sandra
reviews.reviewBody:
The pizza is quite amazing, the best so far on PEI and in Charlottetown. Th e quality of heh ingredients is great! Gives lots of choices, including vegan and gluten-free pizza. Their espresso coffee is awesome as well. Very nice and attentive waitresses.
The only minus is maybe the salad which is smaller than before , the dressing is a bit too ordinary.  But this does not affect very much the   overall experience; it is still a one of my favourite restaurant.
 If the weather is nice, I recommend the patio.

reviews.author: PierreD
reviews.reviewBody: Fantastic!!!! Food was amazing and service was more than Fantastic!!!!

reviews.author: MikeO
reviews.reviewBody: Great food, friendly service. Consistently good food! Would not hesitate to recommend.

reviews.author: JoyM
reviews.reviewBody: Our server was wonderful and the overall experience was great.  The outdoor music really wasn't necessary as other diners and street traffic were enough.  I certainly would recommend giving Piatto a try if you have never been.  We have eaten there several times and we will be back.

reviews.author: kristina
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing service, food and ambiance. We’ve been enjoying the pizza’s and salads for years!!! Tonight we had our favourite pizza and tried the pasta Aglio Olio, wow sooo good. Piatto’s never disappoints!!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
My wife birthday 

When we walk in staff had red rose and 2 glass wine !
Extraordinary touch! Food was best of the best also the owner was outdo with us as clients and with staffs!

reviews.author: MarinaP
reviews.reviewBody: Love that place - all food always fresh, hot pizzas right from oven on my favorite dough.

reviews.author: Bernie
reviews.reviewBody: Best pizza anywhere. I go whenever I am in town. Great service

reviews.author: TraceyC
reviews.reviewBody: Piatto Pizza has some of the best pizza I’ve ever had. I love their thin crust and their variety is perfect!

reviews.author: DonE
reviews.reviewBody: The food was great, booking a reservation was easy and the service was very good.  The setting seemed a little plain though. Definitely would recommend.

reviews.author: DavidG
reviews.reviewBody: Great service and tasty food!

reviews.author: Rondy
reviews.reviewBody:
Pizza is always good
Excellent service
Always go when visiting  Charlottetown 
🌻🌻🌻

location.name: Braxton's Restaurant & Bar at The Algonquin Resort
location.streetAddress: 184 Adolphus St. St. Andrews, NB  E5B 2L6

overview:
Braxton’s Restaurant and Bar honours the esteemed Chef G.F. Braxton and his commitment to the Algonquin’s culinary excellence in the late 1800s. His philosophy of providing uncompromising quality in a casual yet sophisticated setting continues to inspire the chefs of his namesake today.

Centrally located in The Algonquin Resort, Braxton’s is a place for family and friends to gather. Breakfast, dinner, and beverage menus are crafted seasonally with a commitment to fresh local ingredients and a distinct attention to detail. Join us for a warm and elegant dining experience.

reviews.author: JustinH
reviews.reviewBody: Crab cakes looked good, but taste suggested they were not as freshly prepared as would normally be expected from an Algonquin Hotel restaurant. The AFC burger tasted good, but I did expect the habanero aioli to have more kick as I barely noticed it at all. The service was excellent, but I did notice they were unaware of the large Christmas farmers’ market happening down the hall; they assumed it was a large number of checkouts from the previous evening’s event. Regardless, the effort is still noticeable and I really appreciate it all.

reviews.author: GlenC
reviews.reviewBody:
I booked Braxton's for my husband's birthday dinner.  We were visiting NB from Ontario and were staying at the Algonquin.
Firstly, the food was great!  We started with some oysters, which were delicious.  Next came the chowder...fantastic!   I had the scallops and risotto for my main, my husband had the steak.  Both were cooked to perfection.  
The service was second to none!  I believe our server's name was Bart, and he looked after us like we were kings!  When it came time for dessert, we both thought we were full, but since it was my husband's birthday, we thought we would share a dessert.  We couldn't decide which one, so we asked Bart.  He simply said "leave it with me".  Much to our surprise, he returned a short time later with all 3 desserts beautifully presented on a charcuterie board!  But the biggest surprise was when we received the bill, we were not charged for the dessert!  Totally above and beyond our expectations!  Thank you for making an already great trip absolutely fantastic!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: The food was average. Baked Brie wasn’t baked so they took it off the bill. Chef’s Cut was a rather think ribeye.

reviews.author: WayneM
reviews.reviewBody: First time there, everything was great. Would of liked a larger menu selection.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We had a nice, but overpriced  dinner at the Braxton with great service while staying at the Algonquin.  Breakfast was an entirely different experience.  We arrived at 10:35 (because I had to take a COVID test after being selected for random screening at the border) and a snotty waitress refused to seat us b/c breakfast ended at 10:30.  Although other  guests  were still dining, she suggested we take a 15 min walk to Water Street in the pouring  rain.m to find breakfast.  She didnt even offer us coffee.  Not the treatment one would expect in a nice restaurant in an upscale resort.  Very very disappointing.

reviews.author: ChrisW
reviews.reviewBody:
The staff are very good, friendly, polite. Service is fast. Restaurant is nice. The halibut could’ve used more veg and/or something more for the fish as it was just seared fish, rice snd kale 

Overall I’d recommend

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Had a breakfast on Friday November 4th and the young female server with brown hair that served us had a terrible attitude.  She would ask questions in a tone to our party as if we were stupid and roll her eyes because we asked politely if we needed to have one of our party go back to the room to get proof of vaccinations.  Our party member went back we were not rude about it.  But we inconvenienced her with this question and she made sure “make us pay” with her rudeness because of it.  When I asked if she had a problem she took a long pause, acted offended and said no I’ll take your cream for you and laughed.  I then got served my breakfast with the wrong items as I was the one who asked if there was a problem.  She rolled her eyes and left the table without saying anything, served 2 tables and door before going back to the kitchen.  When she came back dropped the plate correction and walked off.  Not once did she ask if we had everything we needed, if everything was ok.  First time in my life I never left a tip.  I didn’t see her providing exceptional service to anyone around us either.  What a disappointment.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Definitely be back

reviews.author: CarolR
reviews.reviewBody:
Amazing meal and service.
Quality was evident in every aspect.
Our server Jimmy was extremely attentive.
My husband had the steak which was done to perfection and I had the halibut - melt in your mouth.
We will definitely return when back to New Brunswick.

reviews.author: ChrisG
reviews.reviewBody: 10/10 would recommend, would definitely go back for more

reviews.author: KTSD
reviews.reviewBody: Why do you tell me to keep it short but still required 50 characters? I'd rather just give a numerical review.....

reviews.author: ThomasM
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, beautiful setting, food was okay not what I would expect for the price but over all decent

reviews.author: Katie
reviews.reviewBody: Service was great. Food was mediocre especially for the price tag. Breakfast was disappointing and also overpriced. The "hashbrowns" were basically tater tots and the "breakfast" sausage was more of a dinner sausage. Would go elsewhere next time, much better options in St Andrews.

reviews.author: WayneandJanine
reviews.reviewBody:
The Crab cakes were the very best we have ever had! Steak was cooked to perfection and full of flavor. Our desserts were simply amazing! I had the lemon raspberry tart and my husband had the chocolate Almond rocher 

We will be back for sure

reviews.author: BettyC
reviews.reviewBody: Thanksgiving prix fixed was lovely.   Regular menu looks enticing as well.  Well trained young wait staff.

reviews.author: DonnaF
reviews.reviewBody: Braxton's  menu offerings and actual choices were both delicious and wholesome.

reviews.author: Julie4tin
reviews.reviewBody: The specialty drink was amazing. The featured beef teriyaki and peanut sauce was delicious. The strip loin  steaks were disappointing but the rest of the items on the main plate was good. The creme brûlée was a knock out! We said it was our anniversary but nothing extra was done and no mention of it by our waiter. Overall, good first experience.

reviews.author: Mortimer
reviews.reviewBody: Enjoyed our meal and quiet table in the corner with a special treat to recognize our anniversary celebration.

reviews.author: BradS
reviews.reviewBody:
Great server; food was terrific;nice birthday celebration. 
Noise from the bar area shoulf  be separated from dining.

reviews.author: JamieConrad
reviews.reviewBody: Way to go Bart . Good server with a great memory.

reviews.author: KristinaK
reviews.reviewBody: We had a great supper at Braxton’s! Our server Natasha provided great service throughout our meal. Everything tasted great!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Nourriture, présentation et ambiance très old fashion :-(

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Very small selection.
Excellent Service
Poor food quality
As if chef had night off

reviews.author: NathanB
reviews.reviewBody: Great staff service, nice environment, food was great.

reviews.author: RichardP
reviews.reviewBody:
We were staying at the hotel so nipping down to Braxtons made sense. 
Crab cakes as a starter were fabulous. Crisp outside and soft in. Perfect. 
Then the tomahawk steak with green beans was superb as well. 
Quick service, well presented food and great friendly staff. 
Excellent choice for dining and celebrations alike

reviews.author: Chimchim
reviews.reviewBody: Choice of menu  is limited for a restaurant in a 4-star hôtel and prices are really high for the quality. Nothing memorable. Staff is really nice however.

reviews.author: BarbG
reviews.reviewBody:
Lobster roll was fantastic!  Food was delivered quickly and hostess was great.  
Request a table away from the bar or entranceway for quieter experience.

reviews.author: SeeBee
reviews.reviewBody: Great service. Dinner was a bit too salty for my taste but nicely presented and generally delicious.

reviews.author: aartg
reviews.reviewBody: The food was ok but nothing special. The desserts were very good

reviews.author: MarJaco
reviews.reviewBody: My husband and I were celebrating our 35th wedding anniversary, so we decided to try Braxton's Restaurant of The Algonquin Resort, which was where we were staying. The ambience is quiet and pretty. Service was great, friendly and courteous. We started with the crab cakes and they were the best we've ever had, a bit spicy, and delicious. I had filet mignon, which came with mashed potatoes and veggies. The steak was cooked to perfection and was delicious. My husband had the halibut and it was very good. Our waiter treated us to a blueberry creme brulee, which was covered in fresh fruits and was delicious. Overall, we had a great experience at Braxton's and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this resto to anyone.

reviews.author: JudiF
reviews.reviewBody: Food was delicious and our server was excellent and very outgoing. Table was in front of the bar so guide noisy.

reviews.author: Lanyp
reviews.reviewBody: Enjoyed our dinner.  Food was very good and room had a good ambience.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great food and service

reviews.author: KirkW
reviews.reviewBody: Food was great. Restaurant was clean and well kept. The staff were amazing. Will definitely go back.

reviews.author: Gonzo
reviews.reviewBody: great meal, halibut ewas great, wine list a little expensive,

reviews.author: JGMTHebert
reviews.reviewBody: Waitress and staff outdid themselves. The drinks were great and food was very well prepared and presented. We are celebrating our 40th wedding anniversary and the chef surprised us with and awesome dessert. Thanks for making this an experience to remember.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Very enjoyable dinner. Food and service was excellent.

reviews.author: DavidL
reviews.reviewBody:
We expecting a fine dining experience on our anniversary but came up short. We came dressed up and expected a nice table but were given a small round bar table in the bar. We requested a nicer spot and then sat us in the dining room. Our waiter mumbled and we didn’t hear a thing he said. Ordered our meal and some one else delivered chicken and steak in about 5min. Faster than Mac Donald’s. Ordered a bottled beer and got a 6oz glass for 9 dollars. Asked numerous times for water refills. 
Folks from the pools and off the street in shorts and bathing suits were seated in the dining room, we were under the impression that it was dressy casual not anything goes. My meal was fine but my wife’s chicken odd tasting and when we inquired they say that they deep fry it for a finish. Didn’t know we were dining at KFC. They did however apologize and deducted her meal from the bill. In conclusion I would say that this place is not a fine dining experience but more of a bar restaurant. Which is deceiving being the fact that it is in the highly rated Algonquin Hotel. Wasn’t really the special occasion that we planned. But we enjoyed the hotel in general.

reviews.author: mommee23
reviews.reviewBody:
Meh. 
Limited menu, not especially creative. Think wedding reception sit down dinner quality. Food was okay, so while I wouldn’t go out of my way to eat there again, I wouldn’t avoid it either. Wine markup was outrageous.

Service was efficient, but a little slow. Restaurant calls for dressy casual- don’t worry about it- wear what you want.

My biggest concern was that there was something that looked like oil or grease on the surface of the water. We did not call it to our server’s attention, drank alcohol instead.

reviews.author: SierraP
reviews.reviewBody: The food was delicious. Service was amazing. We went for our anniversary and it was a great start to our stay in St. Andrews. Our new favourite restaurant!

overview: Introducing STMR.36 BBQ & Social House, open now in Delta Hotels by Marriott Fredericton.

reviews.author: JenniferV
reviews.reviewBody: You guys are consistent…we love your restaurant and look forward to seeing you lots in 2022

reviews.author: JeanneC
reviews.reviewBody: Love eating here.  The noise level gets really high when the restaurantvis full, or someone talks high volume.  Otherwise it is perfect.  Thank you.

reviews.author: DavidM
reviews.reviewBody:
Overall, everything was great. Food was very good.

D.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: The food was incredibly good and very generous portions. The price is high, so this wouldn't be my go to restaurant for a casual meal. Definitely will return for a special event.

reviews.author: KathrynG
reviews.reviewBody: Great restaurant with excellent accommodating staff. The food is excellent and plentiful and prices are reasonable. One of my favorite restaurants.

reviews.author: SandraM
reviews.reviewBody: Our favourite restaurant. Food was delicious as usual.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We had a wonderful waiter and as always the food was delicious. This restaurant is a fave - it’s a great experience and night out!

reviews.author: PamelaM
reviews.reviewBody:
Everyone was great - food, service & atmosphere!
Will be back for sure!

reviews.author: Andy
reviews.reviewBody: Great place to eat and enjoy friends and family! Good value in a fun atmosphere.

reviews.author: Eric
reviews.reviewBody: Outstanding nothing wrong.. never a dissatisfied meal here

reviews.author: SarahF
reviews.reviewBody: Love the atmosphere! Service is always fantastic and friendly. Will continue to come back here.

reviews.author: TaraM
reviews.reviewBody:
We had all eaten there before and were very excited for our lunch. Immediately we were seated and given water so everything started out perfect. 

Our server (not the one who gave us water) really just took forever.  We were there for almost 30 mins before we got our drinks and things just took forever.  I understand being understaffed and busy but we literally watched other tables be seated, order, get their food and pay before we got our main courses.  Only once was the delay even acknowledged when sever mentioned while walking by table and saying our meal was next but no real apologies were ever given. 

 One of the meals was just not to standard (crispy chicken sandwich). Fries were cold and the chicken was over cooked and oozing grease so it soaked through to the bun. When complaint was made and asked for something else server just really stared at us as though it was a completely foreign concept and didn't even apologize or act as though she cared. It was just an annoyance. 

Little things like offering to refill water, ask how food is, taking dirty dishes away, acknowledging requests made with more than a very slight nod would have really helped to avoid the building feeling of disappointment and frustration. 

This was the first time the 3 of us have been out since the pandemic and splurged ($50 lunches are not our norm) and it was just really disappointing. 

I know how hard being a server is and would never harp on someone for doing their best but there are some basic tactics that can be taken to show your customers that they matter and are important. 

We have all eaten there before and have always loved the food and never had issue with service. 

Side note! Margaritas and seafood chowder were delicious!!! Creme brûlée was a delightful surprise and very very good.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Always a hit! Thank you

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Omg it was the noisiest I've ever been there ...people were screaming loud over each other ..could not talk with each other ...too much noise ...no one was thinking of others ... mentioned to waitresses but no concern ...

reviews.author: TammyJ
reviews.reviewBody: This was my second time here and the food and service was outstanding both times. I will be back and would recommend this place to anyone.

reviews.author: IanG
reviews.reviewBody: Absolutely fantastic food, service was spectacular and the recent renovations completed make this a great stop in Fredericton if you want to have a fantastic evening with friends and family.

reviews.author: LouY
reviews.reviewBody: Always a nice spot for either business or pleasure.

reviews.author: DennisL
reviews.reviewBody: Service was incredible and the food excellent. Service dog friendly and made everyone feel welcomed.

reviews.author: AprilW
reviews.reviewBody: Food was amazing and the portions were huge!  Our waiter  was amazing, food was amazing, highly recommend! We will be back 😊

reviews.author: Anna
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent food and excellent service. I would recommend highly.

reviews.author: Arni71
reviews.reviewBody:
Once again, a fantastic meal with outstanding service. Have been several times now and have profoundly enjoyed my experience each and every time!!!

Thank you and keep up the great work!!!!

reviews.author: Kevin
reviews.reviewBody:
Food was okay, blooming onion wasn't cut well or fully cooked. Burger was underseasoned and had been sitting for a bit before I received it (the yolk had run and dried up). Drinks were average. Excellent decore and decent service.

I'll try it again to see if it was a one off.

reviews.author: Kelly
reviews.reviewBody: Steak was undercooked and cold. Paying 50 dollars for a small steak.

reviews.author: CherS
reviews.reviewBody: Service was fantastic. Got louder as the night progressed but it was a great evening out with friends.

reviews.author: MaryseB
reviews.reviewBody: First time thete, we enjoyed every minute... food was good, and portions were large...plus our waitress was absolutly delightful!  Will be back.

reviews.author: TammyB
reviews.reviewBody: The lady that checked our immunization record wasn't very friendly..

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Great service and even better food and drinks. 
Must try: Bourbon Punch, Brisket and Mac N Cheese 
Their Korean fried steak was to die for!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Service was very slow.  Tables that arrived after us received food first.  If you order an appetizer, expect the remainder of your meal at least 45 mins later.

reviews.author: PeterP
reviews.reviewBody: The food was of good quality and flavour and served professionally.  The wait staff was very friendly and courteous but not imposing, while following COVID guidelines to ensure safety.  We do hope to visit this establishment again.

reviews.author: AbbiF
reviews.reviewBody: Our server (Andrew I think?) very friendly and prompt! Great service and the food was delicious.

reviews.author: JeanneC
reviews.reviewBody: Really enjoy the salmon plate and the cheesecake.  Excellent service.  will be back

reviews.author: AmandaA
reviews.reviewBody: Visited to celebrate our wedding anniversary. Service, food, atmosphere were wonderful. 'The Experience' was so amazing!

reviews.author: AllanW
reviews.reviewBody: Booked on line for a reservation.  Arrived well greeted.  Our Waiter was fantastic.  Meal was excellent.  Dessert was delicious.  Waiter recommendations were bang on.

reviews.author: JamesY
reviews.reviewBody: What a great time.  The food was very good and staff were very friendly.   Would strongly recommend as I believe it might be the best spot in Fredericton for a nice meal.   Only problem for us was that our wings while being tasty were not very warm by time they arrived.  2/3 of our table of 4 had same issue with meals.   Also we had a high top table which was by the entrance and not as warm as rest of restaurant appeared.  Nonetheless I would strongly recommend and I will return

reviews.author: JanR
reviews.reviewBody: Brisket was far too fatty.  Pecan chocolate cheesecake was delicious.  Service was great at first but waiter practically disappeared after we were served mains.  Desert and bill too far too long.  Decor is outstanding

reviews.author: SUSANH
reviews.reviewBody: We had a delicious meal and the service was excellent! We will return!

reviews.author: RobB
reviews.reviewBody: We had Jenn Cain as our server and she did an amazing effort to keep up and was always friendly and receptive to any requests our table had

reviews.author: AlexW
reviews.reviewBody: Great evening with family. Service was excellent. Everyone really enjoyed themselves

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great breakfast. Would be 5 stars but my Sunnyside up eggs came as over easy. 🙂

reviews.author: WarrenP
reviews.reviewBody: Great drink.  Good appetizers. Tasty bbq. The sides however need a little work. All of them needed salt. And why you would put so much cumin in a coleslaw in a bbq place?  A 8 out of 10.

location.name: The York Bistro & Pub at Hilton Saint John
location.streetAddress: 1 Market Square Saint John, NB  E2L 4Z5

overview:
"York", Saint John' trendiest dining experience, enhanced by interiors that blends sleek sensibility and contemporary style. York exudes elegance and relaxed comfort in equal measure – from the stylish dining room and bustling bar to the seasonal outdoor sea view terrace and private event rooms.

Located directly on the harbor front within walking distance from 'the boardwalk'. Gastro Pub, featuring a casual dining menu, affordable wine selection, local and imported beers. Soak up the vibe with a handcrafted martini at the bar.

Ideal for a business breakfast, family celebration, or intimate dinner for 2.

York is always approachable, always sophisticated.

reviews.author: RickM
reviews.reviewBody: Deliscious seafood and friendly staff.  Nice to have the restaurant and bar right at the Hotel.

reviews.author: JaniceB
reviews.reviewBody: I might try York Bistro again. I will never use Open Table again. When we arrived for our reservation, the restaurant was closed. We had to find another restaurant.

reviews.author: Kelly
reviews.reviewBody: Wish there was more vegetarian options. Cauliflower steak was not a great attempt.

reviews.author: EXCEPTIONAL
reviews.reviewBody: The York Bistro is the only restaurant in Uptown Saint John with a lovely view of the Harbour. (The Reversing Falls Restaurant has a view of the reversing rapids).  We love this restaurant for its consistent delivery of good food and great service. The restaurant is open to the lobby, which gives a nice expansive feeling, and it morphs into a bit of a bar scene later in the night, which is fun. Often live music too, so pick your dining nights carefully if you want a quieter dinner.  The menu is inventive and consistently solid - no huge surprises and typically well executed. It's not "fine dining" but it's an overall very good dining experience. We frequent the York often and will continue to do so.

reviews.author: nc391032
reviews.reviewBody: Beautiful view, great food and an accommodating waitress (Thanks Elise!). We would not typically have thought to come here but will definitely return.

reviews.author: Stef
reviews.reviewBody: The menu on the app attracted me there. Once in the restaurant, the menu was not the same. Food taste like pre-made kit. Service was good and the server was friendly.

reviews.author: LGood
reviews.reviewBody:
I went here for Saint John Sparkle with 4 other girls. The food was amazing. The Perogie nachos were the favourite and then the deep fried pickles and scallops. Portion size was fare for the price. 

Staff were not prepared for the influx of people that made reservations or were walk ins. The waitress had not worked upstairs before but did quite well once she got her footing. Great seating and I will eat here again but not on such a busy night.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Slow to take orders and disappointing portions. One plate came late.

reviews.author: Oliver92400
reviews.reviewBody: Restaurant bien situé au bord de l’eau, nourriture correcte 👍

reviews.author: LaraB
reviews.reviewBody: My daughter had the Mac and cheese and it was gritty. I had the seafood pasta which had a mound of pasta, 2 scallops and 2 shrimp. The rest was pasta, wasn’t impressed and wouldn’t visit for lunch or supper. The breakfast buffet was really good and we did enjoy that. Would only go back for breakfast.

reviews.author: MarianH
reviews.reviewBody:
I enjoyed the Chop Chop dinner very much. There was also lots to choose from if that
was not your preference.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Ordered muscles. They were clearly left out; cold and dry. Great server who remediate the situation. Meals are overpriced for quantity and quality. Nothing too special; hotel restaurant.

reviews.author: Marilyn
reviews.reviewBody: After celebrating a family birthday at the York Bistro, I would definitely recommend it  Modern in appearance,  it has some interesting menu items as well as some  Maritime old favorites. Good environment to  relax with a meal .  Friendly servers.   A view of the harbor and the boardwalk was an added touch.   Its a place to slow down, so you might want to pass it by if you are on a tight schedule.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Good cocktails but that's about it. The service was exceptionally slow.

reviews.author: Foodie
reviews.reviewBody:
We made reservations on line for 4:30 and unfortunately did not realize the Chop Chop dinner began at 6pm. When we arrived we were blessed to have Deepak reschedule our reservations to a later time. He was wonderfully accommodating. The Buffett was seafood and oysters were advertised But none existed as they had apparently run out the previous day. Very disappointing as this was the top reason I was so excited to try this restaurant for the first  time. Always wondered what it was  like. 
There were a group of very loud people at a couch section that were both rude and swore aloud. I didn't see children in attendance at the restaurant thankfully as it would have been ridiculously inappropriate for them the behave this way at 6pm. 
The Buffett was good but there were no apologies or signs indicating the missing advertised item.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Have been waiting for an hour for 2 3-course meals.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We enjoyed the Thai buffet very much.  The chef was very accomodating when i realized I was allergic to many of the Thai dishes.  I really appreciate his effort  to accomodate my allergies .  The service was excellent and it is a lovely room!

reviews.author: PatS
reviews.reviewBody: We really enjoyed our time at The York Bistro and Pub.  We had a great view of the harbour.  The food was excellent.  We had stopped for a late night coffee and dessert.  Service was good and the atmosphere was really nice!

reviews.author: Reshaw
reviews.reviewBody: Noise from piano in stairwell was so bad we had to move to back of restaurant in breakfast area for a peaceful meal. Waitress was fantastic and accommodating. Seafood (halibut) excellent. Problem, however, with calamari - instead of crispy and flavourful it was tasteless and rubbery.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: It had a nice atmosphere and friendly staff however tne value wasn't there for the price of the food.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
This was our second visit to your restaurant.  Our first experience was amazing. We loved our meal the food was delicious and we couldn't wait to return .  Our next experience was not the same at all.  The drinks were good , service was good but our meal was not.  My husband meal was good but mine was below standard. I had ordered the steak that was the special.  Not one thing on the plate was enjoyable. The steak was cooked as asked but the flavour was not.   The steamed vegetables had no flavour as well. I was very disappointed. Also we had to wait well over a hour.  So you can imagine my disappointment after waiting so long for a meal and to be that dissatisfied.   The waiter did discount  my meal which was nice and I appreciated that.  However we were 30 minutes late for our next event and I was still hungry!  
What happened to the maple Curry dish?  This was amazing and really why I returned.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: This was my favorite restaurant in Saint John thus far. While the service was quite slow and the food was excellent. I found the portions and quality to be really AWESOME! I was surprised that the food was actually better than Port City Royal which turned out to be quite disappointing...I would definitely recommending this as one of the restaurants to try while in Saint John.

reviews.author: DaveD
reviews.reviewBody: The WORST dining experience I've ever had.   The worst service ever in a restaurant, they were not prepared.

reviews.author: Adrienne
reviews.reviewBody: I called  Hilton hotel, where the restaurant is located to provide feedback on our experience. There was a big concert in town and restaurants were booked solid. York Bistro was not well staffed at all to handle the tables yet they would have known for months how busy it would be.  It resulted  in very slow service, cold meal, l and very slow to accept payment. We were all extremely frustrated when we left. Overall, not a good experience.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
With a beautiful view right on the Saint John waterfront, the York Bistro is a hidden gem in our city.  The food was delicious and very reasonably priced.  My wife insists the Beet Salad is the best thing to eat in Saint John!  My personal favourite is the Atlantic Seafood Purse or the PrimeTime Burger.
Although the food was delicious, and it alone will keep me coming back, the view is truly Saint John.  On a calm evening, it is so relaxing and peaceful to sit at the patio and look over the harbour.  The patio faces west so you get the sun all evening and the high glass that surrounds the patio prevents the wind from being a bother.
Highly recommended!!!

reviews.author: PBSJ
reviews.reviewBody: I found it odd that the restaurant takes reservations but has a sign on the counter that says to seat yourself.  Eventually a staff member did find our reservation and show us to a table.  The service was not great.  The food was well presented and well prepared.  We shared the cutting board.  DH had one of the steaks and I had the scallops.  I particularly liked my vegetables and the way they were prepared.

reviews.author: robertb
reviews.reviewBody:
We waited 40 minutes for our appetizers and another 45 for our entrees. The only thing faster was the drinks. 
The restaurant wasn't even crowded, in fact it was fairly empty.

reviews.author: unappy1
reviews.reviewBody:
The food was not great....the kids garden salad was all argula and baby spinach...one small mushroom and one sliced baby carrot and mini tomato sliced and there was no cucumber at all. Disappointing.  The seafood purse appetizer had pureed tuna and salmon in it...no scallops or shrimp and the sauce was bland.  For the entree we ordered the special of fish & chips...one very large piece of breaded haddock...the breading was very well-done (almost burnt in places) and the fish inside was soggy and not cooked in places.  It was the first time in my life that I sent food back to the kitchen.

Overall...not a great evening....and we will not go back there for a meal.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We recieved wonderful service at our anniversary dinner.  The meal was great and the dessert was great.  View at night is great.

reviews.author: oscar
reviews.reviewBody: My husband and I dined at The York Bistro on Father's Day, June 15, 2014.  It was the first time we had eaten in this establishment and I must say we were both more than pleased with both the service and food.  Staff were very accommodating (I have a food allergy re shell fish) and they were very obliging in exchanging the seafood chowder for tomato basil soup, which was the best tomato soup I have ever eaten.  There were no long delays, water glasses and coffee mugs were replenished without asking.  All-in-all, it was a great dining experience and one that we will enjoy again.

reviews.author: JoeWorden
reviews.reviewBody:
1. It was obvious upon arrival our reservation had not been read. Specifically requested window and was seated at wall
2. Food portions sized for a child
3. Server abandoned us for 15 min at end of meal. We just put our coats on and waited at cash so we could just leave without asking for dessert or more beverages
4. Overall the interior decoration and furniture saved this location from a poor rating

reviews.author: mags
reviews.reviewBody: Although I booked for a group (of guests from out of town) there wasn't enough wait staff working, and service was very slow. Other diners made so much noise I had trouble hearing people at my own table. (While this isn't the restaurant's fault, we should have been offered a table further from the bar area.) And the food (beef, salmon) was overcooked. Love the location, but disappointed otherwise.

reviews.author: Malbecfav
reviews.reviewBody:
We thought we would take out a work colleague and the menu for chop chop suited all 6 of us.. the pot pie was fabulous.. you ran out of the creme brule (my favorite) but all others enjoyed to black forest cake.

It was a nice experience. Service was a little slow for a business lunch but overall we enjoyed it.

reviews.author: lolo
reviews.reviewBody:
It was my mothers 84th birthday. There was four ladies. The view was spectacular, the Queen Mary 2 was leaving the harbour. It was a beautiful sunny day. The food was terrific and the waiter was wonderful and attentive. We dined for 3 hours and no one rushed us, the waiter was very patient and kind and lots of smiles.
The greek salad was one of the best i have eaten.
Really enjoyed our day.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Atmosphere was great, very festive for the occasion.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: This was my second experience - the first was Brilliant - this one wasn't. It started on well she took drink orders and delivered them however once the main course were served (no bread offered) - the food was good - not great like last time - but it was good - but then the waitress disappeared..the 2 male waiters and bartender spent the rest of the night looking for her. And I mean looking for her. We didn't get any offer of dessert or coffee and when they finally found her she well lets just say everyone was fed up. The bartender was the one to bring the dessert menus and he had no idea how to put those medal menus on the table - almost dropping them in places that they didn't fit; no coffee cups when coffee pots were finally brought

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Our server was great....good strong food and wine knowledge. Excellent "up seller"...food was outstanding...excellent....couldn't have gotten a better meal in a 5 star stand-alone restaurant.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great food. Excellent service! The best service staff in the industry! They make you feel as though you came to their own house to dine.

reviews.author: NorthShoreFoodie
reviews.reviewBody: Sadly overcooked procuitto wrapped scallops (still pretty good - could have been great), and a dry, overcooked halibut made for a disappointing meal out. Service was a bit slow, despite the restaurant being quite empty. I did have a lovely cocktail, "The York". And the location is nice, overlooking the boardwalk and ocean.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We loved the openness/ friendly atmosphere of the pub area - a bit too cold to sit on the patio, but from our table we had a great view of the harbour. Both the stuffed chicken breast and Yellow currey shrimk were delicious. We found that the tomatoes used in the caprese salad were a bit too soft - but it had a deliciou flavour none the less. Server was very attentive. We will certainly be back to try more selections from the menu.

location.name: Montana's BBQ & Bar - Saint John
location.streetAddress: 51 Depot Crt Saint John, NB  E2J 0C2

overview:
Montana's BBQ & Bar is a Canadian restaurant that is famous for in-house smoked pork Ribs,
Fresh Canadian Steaks, and Juicy Burgers.

reviews.author: LeeN
reviews.reviewBody: Would recommend Montana’s, having been coming here since opening. Variety of food, big booths, and attentive server. Only down side was noise interfered with conversation.

reviews.author: Cathy
reviews.reviewBody: The steak was cooked to perfection. So many places don't know what medium-rare means..  Montana's in not one of them.  You can count on the quality.

reviews.author: SusanR
reviews.reviewBody: Our service and food was very good. Service was quick our meal was hot. It was a little too cool temperature wise and music was quite loud. But that would not keep me from returning

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Bathroom were really dirty and dining room had lots of dust build up

reviews.author: Patrice
reviews.reviewBody: Went with 2 kids: 6yo and 3yo. Server was great with the kids and very helpful. Drink took a little while to get but the waitress updated me that they were just having trouble finding an ingredient for the drink. I didn’t even think they were taking a long time with it but waitress was apologetic. Also gave us 2 cookies for the wait.

reviews.author: Vicki
reviews.reviewBody: Had to ask for everything!  She never brought drinks, sauces, etc.  We received our food quickly but then we waited and waited for drinks, dessert, and the bill.  We could have been in/out in 45 minutes but it took 1.5 hours.  Food was delish but the service stunk.

reviews.author: Greg
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent food and service as always.  Well organized and comfortable.

reviews.author: Kevin
reviews.reviewBody: My meal was as i ordered and then waited 17 minutes for them to deliver the correct order to my table.

reviews.author: TroyM
reviews.reviewBody: Despite covid and restrictions, my daughter was able to have 2 bubble friends join her for a birthday lunch... complete with fancy drinks! Food was great and fast

reviews.author: KelliP
reviews.reviewBody: Food was just ok. I had the chicken tacos and I was disappointed.

reviews.author: JuanitaA
reviews.reviewBody: Great food, Andy was our server in bar area great service from him.  Only issue is we were meeting family members there, which I reserved a table at 5:15 and our party was seated in different area than us and had to go back to hostess to figure out error.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
We had a great time!!
We all loved all of our meals!!
Delicious food and appetizers!!
Our new get-together spot!!❤️

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Planned a family staycation and decided to check out this location. Service was quick, friendly and food was delicious.

reviews.author: HeatherS
reviews.reviewBody: although the ribs were excellent the sirloin steak was tough  and overdone. sweet potatoe fries were also not great

reviews.author: ScottC
reviews.reviewBody: Service was good however the food was mediocre at best.

reviews.author: JohnB
reviews.reviewBody: great food and good service. A bit overpriced in my opinion but still good.

reviews.author: Brandon
reviews.reviewBody: Good staff, clean restaurant, I always look forward to coming here.

reviews.author: KathleenL
reviews.reviewBody: Our waitress was excellent and the food was delicious.  Montana's has always been one of our favorite places to eat.  I love their fajitas and my husband loves the steak.

reviews.author: ScottV
reviews.reviewBody: We don’t go out very often. So to receive service like we did.  Was awesome.  Thank you

reviews.author: SarahM
reviews.reviewBody: Overall good.  The restrictions were being followed.  Server was friendly.  Food was decent.  Steak a bit dry and over cooked.

reviews.author: MHenry
reviews.reviewBody: Service was slow, food was really slow, all our orders were wrong.

reviews.author: Bill
reviews.reviewBody: Great food, great portions, minimal wait time, excellent service, descent prices.

reviews.author: GlennR
reviews.reviewBody: Overall everything was up to our expectations and would definitely would reserve and go back.

reviews.author: Katt
reviews.reviewBody: Food and Service was great, as always. Have never had a bad experience at Montanas.

reviews.author: JolineR
reviews.reviewBody:
We enjoyed our meal. But I did not know I had to download an app in order to receive the free starter. My booking ref number should  have showed them I booked on line. We are seniors and I'm sorry I didn't know . Service was very good. Thanks
Joline

reviews.author: JohnM
reviews.reviewBody: We received our food very fast and it was delicious.  Friendly staff and great service.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Always a good spot.

reviews.author: DeloresF
reviews.reviewBody: Decent food, cooked appropriately and served in decent time.  Very big box style restaurant food, reminds me of Boston Pizza, East Side Mario's etc.  Will be back, just not right away.

reviews.author: NicoleD
reviews.reviewBody: Waitress was so amazing!!!  Food was great.  It was quiet due to covid

reviews.author: ChadM
reviews.reviewBody: We had a nice dining experience. The staff made our daughter’s 14th birthday dinner a success!

reviews.author: ToddK
reviews.reviewBody: We were sat right away on arrival and taken care of . Food was great . Server was excellent. Was a great night out .

reviews.author: PBSJ
reviews.reviewBody: The menu was much smaller than previously.  There was sufficient choice for all of us to be happy with our lunch.  Basically alternate tables are in use so the restaurant is quieter than it would be with a higher number of diners.  The service was pleasant and prompt.  I would certainly go back again if I were in the mood for ribs or a burger.

reviews.author: MelissaM
reviews.reviewBody: Great food great price our server was excellent refilled drinks without even being asked checked on us multiple time’s during meal

reviews.author: ROXANNEM
reviews.reviewBody: It was the first time we ate out since COVID we were happy with the gloves and masks present on all the servers

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Not pleased with the limited menu. My salad was wilted and some of the lettuce was bad. My son didn’t enjoy his burger. He said it was dry. We enjoyed our deep fried pickles and mini donuts though!! Hope you return to a full menu soon. We will return once that happens!!

reviews.author: JulieM
reviews.reviewBody: Our server was friendly but not great. Did not offer ketchup or drink refills or dessert. My soup was tasty but cold. I asked the server to heat it in the microwave. By the time I got it back, everyone else at my table had finished eating and my soup was spilled all over the plate. My daughter got a kids meal. She asked for an ice cream sandwich. The server forgot to bring it. I had to follow the server into the drink area after I paid my bill in order to get the dessert.

reviews.author: KeithM
reviews.reviewBody: Ordered two 10oz sirloins to be Med Well.  One came out correct, and the other was still extremely pink throughout.   Mushrooms were not cooked and did not make it out to the table with the steak.  It was not busy at all, and more care could have been taken in the order.

reviews.author: Carloseuv
reviews.reviewBody:
One of my favourites. They are doing an awesome job with covid protocol.
Feel safe and love them. Even on tough times they are still nice and very clean.

reviews.author: SusanaC
reviews.reviewBody: Terrible service at this location. We had reservations for 5:15 and they seated us promptly. only an hour later did they take our order and even after being advised that there was a type 1 diabetic child at the table, it took another hour to get our food. We were celebrating a birthday and the birthday girl almost left before being acknowledged. We'll never go back .

reviews.author: ColinK
reviews.reviewBody: Had all you can eat ribs.  Service was quick.  Waitress was really pleasant

Make your rib dinner Gluten Friendly by skipping the cornbread. Ask your server for details

location.name: Montana's BBQ & Bar - Halifax
location.streetAddress: 194B Chain Lake Dr Halifax, NS  B3S 1C5

overview: Montana's BBQ & Bar is a Canadian restaurant that is famous for in-house smoked pork Ribs, Fresh Canadian Steaks, and Juicy Burgers.

reviews.author: Murman
reviews.reviewBody: Service was great, food was good and the ambiance was what was expected. Selection of beers was limited with no Stout or Porter. It was a nice night out.

reviews.author: DeborahM
reviews.reviewBody: My meal of the chicken wrap was very tasty and the food was hot.  My husband ordered beans for his side with his steak and he did not like the taste of the beans, they were far too sweet for him.  Our waiter, Jack was very polite and accommodating.  Overall our experience was a good one.

reviews.author: timk
reviews.reviewBody: Food and service are always amazing our waitress  was always close by and check on us several times

reviews.author: NicolaT
reviews.reviewBody: The food was great and done to preference. I always come here as I can use my scene points as well.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Had a burger which was clearly from a frozen or mass produced patty. It had the consistency of a chicken nugget.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Just a good time

reviews.author: JasonL
reviews.reviewBody:
I'll eat there again as it hits on what i need for the family but this outing was a miss.  I'll stick to Dartmouth location next time.  Waitress was awful.  We were seated in bar area and I think she was supposed to be bartending.  Waiting tables was not for her. 
 Took way to long given we were in there before it got busy.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome, thanks

reviews.author: Smallfry
reviews.reviewBody: All good enjoyed everything. Wonderful customer service compared to other places in the city.

reviews.author: Dgal
reviews.reviewBody: Was upset to see the menu had changed yet again. I was there for my Birthday was looking forward to the chicken and rib combo which is no longer. Reservations were for 7:30 got there at 7:20 seated right away. Lovely server, apologetic for our food wait apps came quickly. Customers who arrived after us getting their food orders. 8:35 our food came , husbands house salad had brown lettuce. My vegetables were cold . We did get 25% off our Bill but it ruined our e pierence. We won’t be going back. We were going to get dessert was figured it might be breakfast before we got it , oh and my chicken was over fried and my husbands steak burnt on one side.

reviews.author: FosterS
reviews.reviewBody: Steaks were tough and overcooked. Sides we cold and were missing one on two of the orders. The staff looked grazzled.

reviews.author: TracyK
reviews.reviewBody: Food was great, staff were friendly and welcoming and service was fast.

reviews.author: PatrickM
reviews.reviewBody: We ordered 2 apple pecan salads & 2 tomato basil soups.  The food was very good except the chef forgot to add the pecans.  Our server was very concerned and provided us with a generous gift card for our next visit.

reviews.author: JennL
reviews.reviewBody: Supper was great. The steak was amazing. The mac and cheese with cornbread was very tasty and the proportions were large. We will be back.

reviews.author: EdgarR
reviews.reviewBody: The food was a bit on the cold side when it was delivered to our table

reviews.author: AmandaC
reviews.reviewBody: The app. was good, but took 45 mins to receive and it was not busy by any means that evening. Our main meals were good and took longer then it should have to get. Dessert was burnt and also took a long time to get. However, waitress was great in recognizing the issues and we weren’t charged for the app. or the dessert and got a coupon for 15% off our next meal… which seems to be a regular occurrence based on previous visits over the years. Not a go to spot for us and figured since we haven’t been in over a year, we’d give it another try.

reviews.author: edwardh
reviews.reviewBody: MAKE SURE YOUR FOOD ARRIVES HOT AND MAKE SURE THERE IS DREESING ON YOUR SALAD

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Food was good we had 2 servers and done things got lost in transit to the table

reviews.author: NickiT
reviews.reviewBody: Quick service, a nice meal, and speedy checkout.

reviews.author: JanetI
reviews.reviewBody: First time I ever had the beef rib. Delicious and nice and tender.

reviews.author: sabean123
reviews.reviewBody: While the ribs were very tasty, I found them to be VERY dry. I haven't been there in 3 yrs and they were dry then. I had hoped they were different, but they were not. On top of that, the waitress upsold me on a food item and neglected to tell me so thus my food bill was more expensive than anticipated. I don't like sneaky waitresses like that. I will be going elsewhere for ribs in the future.

reviews.author: RobertP
reviews.reviewBody: The first round of All-You-Can_Eat Ribs was prefect but the second round was dried and tough although they still tasted great!

reviews.author: ConnieB
reviews.reviewBody: So good and great service but music was to loud ,always a favourite

reviews.author: AnthonyC
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome place to eat! Quick service and great food !

reviews.author: DonnaM
reviews.reviewBody: Ordered sirloin steak and it was tough. My husband ordered chicken and ribs combo, came with shrimp skewers chicken and ribs were ok , the shrimp had not much flavour. Service was good and drinks were good. Oh and forgot they asked if there was a special occasion for eating there and I told them anniversary and nothing was mentioned, so why ask.

reviews.author: Bkenny
reviews.reviewBody: Waitress was outstanding, interacted with our toddler and regularly checked by so we weren't stuck waiting for anything. Wait for food was under 30 mins

reviews.author: Danielle
reviews.reviewBody: Food was delicious!! Our server, Erin, was fantastic!

reviews.author: brendam
reviews.reviewBody:
We had a great server Nichol the service was great food was great 
We had a bad timeb last month but great on Sunday We will be back 
Brenda Lee Margettes

reviews.author: mikaW
reviews.reviewBody: Ribs are always great, love the kapow shrimp and all the sides are great

reviews.author: Tamalina
reviews.reviewBody:
Had birthday dinner with family. 
Had 7 oz. Steak, caesar salad. My dad had the trio combo. By the end of meal you could tell he enjoyed it by the bbq sauce all over his face. Good thing wet wipes  provided. Hehe! 
The staff were awesome.

reviews.author: NoGo
reviews.reviewBody: Had to ask 3 times for ketchup.  Forgot a drink.  Wings were extremely overcooked all dried out.

reviews.author: VictoriaP
reviews.reviewBody: Food was really good and the service was as well. Wasn’t busy so wasn’t too noisy.

reviews.author: DawnO
reviews.reviewBody: A bit too much batter in the fish (amd chips) for my liking but other a good meal.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Super Nice staff Abs excellent service.

reviews.author: Melly
reviews.reviewBody:
The staff is amazing and friendly. The servers helped us with gluten free options and substitution options. 
Food was wonderful and I highly suggest thr Beef rib ;)

reviews.author: ElkeJ
reviews.reviewBody: Our server was patient and very polite.  Her knowledge of the menu to excellent.

reviews.author: KrisJ
reviews.reviewBody: We made a reservation through open table and got right in. Great service and a wonderful afternoon meal.

reviews.author: NancyF
reviews.reviewBody: Our sever was great.  The food was very tasty.  I like how you got a birthday deal.  My dessert for my birthday was really good.

reviews.author: MikeK
reviews.reviewBody: Loved being able to book ahead.  My wife & I both had the ribs.  They were excellent.   Service was great

reviews.author: GregM
reviews.reviewBody:
Your burger had  the consistency of a hockey puck. Have no idea how the kitchen could even serve this. It was burnt and hard as a rock. I said nothing as the server was so nice and I don’t like to complain even if it was deserved.
     So onto the wings. They were soaked in sauce. Way too much. They were my sons. I had one and it was disgusting.
     I love bbq but Montana’s is second rate now. Used to be so good. Time to find a new bbq eatery.

Coat of Arms (Scottish 80 Shilling Ale) - 5.0% ABV
items.desc: A malt-forward, smooth traditional Scottish Ale. COAT OF ARMS is brewed in honour of our deep Scottish roots. It blends local malts and hops with old-world Scottish heritage. A year-round beer 'Signature Line' rather than seasonal offering, COAT OF ARMS has been the subject of many focus groups and social occasions. A true crowd-pleaser!

items.title: St. Andrews Cross (Extra Pale Ale) - 6.2% ABV
items.desc: A light, crisp, refreshing American style ale, ST. ANDREWS CROSS will also be a part of the New Scotland 'Signature Line'. The XPA is an easy drinking, popular choice which will appeal to the masses for its astonishing floral and citrus aroma and flavour as well as it's incredible drinkability, moderate ABV (~6%) and popular North American hops

items.title: Rampant Lion (IPA) - 6.9% ABV
items.desc: This American IPA is a different soul from the reincarnated IPA style. This golden balanced IPA's signature is the playfulness between its bitterness and intense floral aromatics and complex citrus flavours. Hop heads and craft beer connoisseurs will feel Rampant Lion's fierce bite

items.title: Lowlander (Oatmeal Stout) - 4.2% ABV
items.desc: New Scotland, like Old Scotland, was built on the backs of the lowlander in the mines and forges that defined them. Lowlander is a dark, creamy, chocolaty, extremely drinkable toasty black ale that pays tribute to the lowlanders of their time

opening_hours:

Thu–Sat 12:00 pm–12:00 am
overview: New Scotland Brewing Co is a community based microbrewery and live music venue located in heart of Downtown Dartmouth Nova Scotia, overlooking the Halifax Harbour. NSBC is dedicated to showcasing the best Nova Scotia has to offer, all while producing exceptional Nova Scotia small batch beer, mead and cider. New Scotland Brewing Co. has a partnership with their friends at Stone Pizza to provide a delicious selection of quality pizza and appetizers.

reviews.author: ShawnaH
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing staff and service, amazing atmosphere and the best entertainment!!!  We will be back!!!

reviews.author: KellyW
reviews.reviewBody: Great venue with a great variety of beers and exceptional live music.

reviews.author: SimonT
reviews.reviewBody: Nice small pub, pizzas were very good, good selection of beers on tap.

reviews.author: LynnC
reviews.reviewBody: We had a wonderful food , drink and entertainment experience! The music Horsebath was terrific, the atmosphere swell and service top notch! We had pizza and nachos from next door! Delicious

reviews.author: ChrisS
reviews.reviewBody: Enjoyed ourselves - good service, good beer, good performance from the stage act.

reviews.author: LianneL
reviews.reviewBody: The only thing that I could ask is that there be a little more comfortable option than only the metal stools. We would have stayed longer but our backs were really hurting after a couple hours. Everything else was wonderful.

reviews.author: LoriL
reviews.reviewBody: We went to see a musician. There were people talking loudly and it interfered with hearing the musician. I also find it rude when people talk when someone is playing. Would be nice to make an announcement at the start that it’s a listening room when people are playing

reviews.author: PatriciaM
reviews.reviewBody: Fun brew pub serving great beer and local gourmet  pizza

reviews.author: PatriciaM
reviews.reviewBody: A fun brew pub with great atmosphere and music , we recommend!

reviews.author: BrianH
reviews.reviewBody: Great place to bring friends,  great beer and great music, the pizza was excellent, will return

reviews.author: CherylA
reviews.reviewBody: Exceptional service, refreshing beverages, delicious pizza!

reviews.author: HeidiC
reviews.reviewBody: Great service - perfect roof top patio

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Super service et la pizza est tellement bonne

reviews.author: JenB
reviews.reviewBody: I go to new Scotland often and love it every time. Service is always great. Beer is awesome. It’s intimate and friendly.

reviews.author: Gina
reviews.reviewBody: Great drinks, great service, great food,  great atmosphere!

reviews.author: PetraT
reviews.reviewBody: Great place, awesome music and fantastic attentive staff.

reviews.author: JasonF
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome place with amazing service and even better beer!

reviews.author: Rick
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, food and drinks. And Willie Stratton was AMAZING!

reviews.author: DianaC
reviews.reviewBody: My favorite spot in downtown Dartmouth!  The live music creates a great ambience.

reviews.author: AngelaP
reviews.reviewBody: The coolest place in HRM to have  a brew and listen to music.

reviews.author: RoyT
reviews.reviewBody: Top notch service, great ambience, amazing performer.

reviews.author: NatashaR
reviews.reviewBody: Cider was good, ordered pizza from stone pizza and it was delicious!

reviews.author: CatherineS
reviews.reviewBody: Very friendly staff, helpful with menu selection and very prompt to check in.  Food was excellent, live music was great and overall a very cool place to spend an evening.

reviews.author: Graham
reviews.reviewBody: Good friends wonderful servers. Great beer! Live music in an intimate setting

reviews.author: RyanK
reviews.reviewBody:
Great place great beer

I would highly recommend this place

reviews.author: BrookeN
reviews.reviewBody: Intimate setting. Live music was great. They offer pizza from a different restaurant so it isn’t theirs to rate but it was good and their service was good.  Friendly, fast and up beat. We went for the music, I’m not a beer drinker so I shouldn’t rate it. But that is all they offer is their own beer. I would go again if someone I wanted to see was playing. I would probably go without the music if I liked beer.

reviews.author: JuliaM
reviews.reviewBody: Great music, awesome staff, tasty drinks 🥰 I love the pizza there too! The chicken wing pizza is so good

reviews.author: MatthewW
reviews.reviewBody: Always a pleasant time. Good beer, friendly staff and the live music is top notch. Have never had food from Stone Pizza, so can’t rate or comment on it.

reviews.author: Spant
reviews.reviewBody: Beer selection was great, and the pizzas from Stone Pizza were excellent. Everyone in our party was quite satisfied overall. Will definitely be back.

reviews.author: Cindy
reviews.reviewBody: Music and drinks were fantastic.  Food selection was very limited and Disappointing.  Even just having appetizers would be nice such as wings, Fried, charcuterie board, etc.

reviews.author: MissM
reviews.reviewBody: Always a great time! Friendly and fun staff. Great craft beers and live music!

reviews.author: MartiniGoddess
reviews.reviewBody: Great service on the patio on a Saturday afternoon! Staff were great in helping my dad decide which beers to try on his flight :)

reviews.author: GrantM
reviews.reviewBody: A cozy, casual little place that has quality on site brewed beer and cider complimented by excellent gourmet pizza delivered to site by the Stone Pizza folks down the street. It has a friendly vibe with excellent staff.

reviews.author: TrevorR
reviews.reviewBody: Great Spot, kept live Music going through the pandemic. Awesome staff and great beer.

reviews.author: JoyceG
reviews.reviewBody: Nice, music free, beer crafted, excellent, staff friendly, pizza looked awesome but never ate, no parking, had to walk long way..

reviews.author: Daniel
reviews.reviewBody: The bartender will dance for small change and is quite happy to do so

reviews.author: Rainbowbrite
reviews.reviewBody:
Delicious beer. Great tunes. Expediant and fun service.
Highly recommend.

reviews.author: CatrinaB
reviews.reviewBody: We had a great time. Fast service from our bartender and the food arrived quickly. Music was perfect for the setting. Thanks Mike & Dylan!

reviews.author: guest
reviews.reviewBody: Great atmosphere! Would definitely attend again in future

reviews.author: StefN
reviews.reviewBody: Mike and Gwen were amazing!!! They were kind, prompt and accommodating. We will be back!

location.name: Harbourstone Pour House
location.streetAddress: 1919 Upper Water Street Halifax, NS  B3J 3J5

overview:
Welcome to Harbourstone Pour House. Join us in a truly inviting social atmosphere while savoring the locally inspired cuisine. With our Executive Chef Trevor Simms at the helm each dish & drink at Harbourstone has a tale to tell, our Chef crafted menu tells a story of Halifax and its relationship with the world and the local purveyors who support it. Harbourstone also features classic inspired cocktails, showcasing local favorites from our Lead Mixologist Ashley Ryan .
Join us today, and let the story begin..

reviews.author: Trivianoni
reviews.reviewBody: We attended on trivia night. Good food, a good group of people. Nice atmosphere. Free underground parking with you meal receipt.

reviews.author: AlastairC
reviews.reviewBody: Had an awesome meal.  Great tastes, good servings and great service!

reviews.author: TroyL
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent food, service and ambiance. THE best nachos. A+

reviews.author: MikeW
reviews.reviewBody: This experience was, by far, the BEST service I have EVER had!  (And we are not new to the eating out thing).  We were blown away by the service especially,  but the meal, the menu variety, and ambience was all top notch!  Well done, Pour House!!

reviews.author: KimB
reviews.reviewBody: The food was awesome the waitress was incredible, enjoyable evening

reviews.author: JeanM
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, in and out in a timely manner during a business lunch.

reviews.author: Trivianoni
reviews.reviewBody: Trivua night at Harbourstone. Food was very good. We had the club house on hluten free bread very tasty

reviews.author: Colleen
reviews.reviewBody: The live music really added to our experience. From the manager Chris to our server, the service was top notch. We will definitely go back!

reviews.author: Melissa
reviews.reviewBody: Food and service were great. Will definitely be back!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great night!

reviews.author: Riley
reviews.reviewBody: The wait staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and efficient. The menu is small but varied (due to Covid conditions I think) and everything is very good. I have had the Brie sandwich several times with a salad and have never been disappointed. One of our party was there for the first time and said the fish and chips were the best she has had in the Halifax area. We all agreed we will definitely be back.

reviews.author: APlocal
reviews.reviewBody: Lovely restaurant, big portions but in a good way. Would recommend if you need a plan on taking family from out of town to breakfast.

reviews.author: likestoeat
reviews.reviewBody: Great food great service and great pricing! Would recommend the harbour stone!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Burger week and first ever visit to this restaurant

reviews.author: JennyH
reviews.reviewBody: We had a wonderful meal. It was our first time but we will certainly come back. The way they spoilt our 2 yr old was such a joy. The food was delicious and our table was perfect. Thank you

reviews.author: AmandaL
reviews.reviewBody: Friendly staff, comfortable seating, access to underground parking.  The food was good (nachos were great).  Our server was very friendly, but not attentive at all.  From when we were all finished eating to when we saw him again to ask for the bill was a solid 30 minutes.  And it wasn't that busy.

reviews.author: Teri
reviews.reviewBody: The meals were delicious, the portions almost too large, and the service was impeccable. I will definitely be returning.

reviews.author: GregM
reviews.reviewBody: It was an awesome experience and the open trivia game was a friendly experience. The stay at the Marriott, the restaurant was a great time. We will be back again.

reviews.author: Trivianoni
reviews.reviewBody: Trivia night is a great night to get out. Rib special was delighted.

reviews.author: JuneR
reviews.reviewBody: Great meal, good value for the money, even the kids liked it, best nachos and chowder in Halifax!

reviews.author: RelaxedMom
reviews.reviewBody:
We booked a mini-vacay at the Marriott Harbourfront for March break. It was great to have easy access to this decent restaurant for our first meal out as a family since COVID started a year ago. What a great experience! First of all, any dinner that has my 11-year-old eating with gusto has my seal of approval; their fave was the Korean chicken wings & ribs. I had a chowder with decently-sized chunks of yummy seafood. 'Partner had a club sandwich with more bacon than chicken--so, like, wasn't complaining. 5yo had a harder time (especially since we wanted them to have real dinner and not kids menu stuff) but still managed to eat some of the charcuterie board supplemented by my partner's fries. All in all, we had a really relaxed dinner where we felt part of the action but not overwhelmed with bustle. The kids wanted to go back for every meal! In terms of value, dinners are great but breakfast is steep, with no smaller appetite options for adults. 

I will say, we'll be back for the Korean wings & ribs even when we're not staying at the hotel!

reviews.author: torryek
reviews.reviewBody: This place is always filled with friendly faces that are ready to help with anything you might need. Fantastic food and even better staff! 10/10

reviews.author: SushuP
reviews.reviewBody: Chef Trevor Simms prepared a memorable meal. Flavours were exquisite! Will return!

reviews.author: NicoleP
reviews.reviewBody: Service and food was excellent! We had the steak and frites 😋 it’s not our first time dining here and we never had an issue to complain about.

reviews.author: mickaroo
reviews.reviewBody:
The restaurant was quiet due to COVID restrictions, giving the server ample time to be friendly and attentive. We ordered the Larder Board to share for starter. I ordered the seafood pasta for my main course, and my wife ordered the stuffed chicken breast.

The Larder Board was a pleasant surprise. Certainly enough for two and a good selection of cheese, cured meats and pickles. The main courses, however, were less impressive.

When the two plates arrived, the first thing my wife and I did was swap plates. The seafood pasta was pretty much as advertised, but the "stuffed chicken breast" was two pieces of chicken; a breast and wing, and a thigh and leg. Effectively half a chicken... and way more than my wife could ever eat.

Under the present circumstances not a bad evening out, but it could have been better.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Food is very good ! The waiter we had he was excellent very friendly and good service . Love the decor they have . Also when I went they had trivia night which I did not know about , but was also really fun

reviews.author: JenW
reviews.reviewBody: Service was phenomenal!  The special was a grilled chicken and goat cheese panini, it was so delicious!!! The rest of our meal was also quite tasty.  Overall a wonderful nite out and a great first experience at the Harbourstone!

reviews.author: PaulG
reviews.reviewBody: My wife and I arrived about 15 minutes before our reservation and were greeted by a very friendly hostess and seated right away.  The service we received from our waiter was great from beginning to the end of our meal.  I really enjoyed the entertainment by a single guitar player and his interaction with the customers.  Also we used the parking in the Marriott and it was covered by the hotel as we spent enough money in the restaurant which was a nice bonus.  This was our first time eating at this restaurant but I will go back and also recommend this restaurant for my friends and family.

reviews.author: Veronica
reviews.reviewBody: The french toast amazing! The service sooo warm.  I was celebrating my birthday and the check was cero!!!! With a nice note. An amazing and unexpected gift! Thanks!!!

reviews.author: susans
reviews.reviewBody: Good breakfast.

reviews.author: susans
reviews.reviewBody: Good service. Food was good

reviews.author: susans
reviews.reviewBody: Seafood chowder was very good.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent, efficient service! My client was thrilled with her menu choice which was the lobster sandwich.

reviews.author: JaneW
reviews.reviewBody: Fabulous dinner out for Valentine's Day. We had the 3 course Dine Around Halifax menu and it was fabulous. A lovely singer added to the romantic atmosphere and the included wine pairings was an added bonus.

reviews.author: JenniferP
reviews.reviewBody: We had an amazing time! The food was to dies for, the service was fantastic, and it wasn't too busy so we didn't feel rushed for our seats. We had tickets to a show, and our server was able to have our food at the table quickly.  We will definitely be back!

reviews.author: AndrewD
reviews.reviewBody: Its actually a great place for lunch. Comfy, stylish, not pretentious and a great location.  I will be back.

reviews.author: Denis
reviews.reviewBody:
Wonderful environment. 
Great service.
Highly recommend.

reviews.author: KathleenO
reviews.reviewBody: Fantastic Food Always!  Very nice restaurant - was a work lunch.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Very kind and attentive staff
Great food and drink
Highly recommended for a relaxed meal

reviews.author: LindaH
reviews.reviewBody: Definitely a great place to have a meal. The waiters were fantastic and the Christmas menu was superb.  We plan on returning.

overview:
Created by Chef Elliot, the Garden offers internationally inspired food with Atlantic Canadian ingredients and cooking methods. Dishes like Persian Beef Tartar, Smoked Sturgeon Ravioli, Garden's special Lobster Rolll, and Maritime Salmon Hodgepodge are some of the dinner favourites. Our cocktail and mocktail menu is created by talented Zack Spears.

The Garden restaurant is centrally located in downtown Halifax, at the corner of Clyde and Queen. Our 4,000 sq ft beautiful restaurant/bar is illuminated by wall-to-wall windows, letting in an abundance of natural light, and our interiors feature a variety of exquisite, hand-crafted and imported materials from a variety of Iran and Turkey including turquoise-tiled walls and Persian artifacts, a modern, open kitchen, and a lovely array of seating options, including locally-built hardwood tables, chairs, and a playful set of swings as dining seats. We are a 80 seat restaurant along with multiple private rooms, and a 50 seat patio.
