location.name: The Old Triangle Irish Alehouse - Halifax

overview:
NOTE: PATIO AND MUSIC
We do not reserve tables in our main floor live music room, and do not accept reservations for our outdoor patio area's in the summer.


The Celtic heart of Halifax, The Old Triangle is a casual Irish pub. We feature an extensive menu of traditional Irish and Atlantic Canadian dishes, including gluten free, vegetarian and children's menus. We have an extensive selection of beverages, including local craft and imported beers, excellent wines and a fine selection of whiskies. The main stage features live music 7 nights a week. A 60 seat patio in the summer, whiskey flights all year round, and the best staff in the city!


Sláinte!

reviews.author: SharonR
reviews.reviewBody: We made a reservation couple weeks in advance.we are here in the summer thought we would go back.This time it was awful the waiter was very rude brought our appitiers out after our meal.Did nothing to fix it . unfortunately we will not be back to this restaurant.waiter had a very poor additude.

reviews.author: StephanieP
reviews.reviewBody:
Our waitress was so attentive and polite and charming. I didn't get her name, but she was truly lovely.
Prices are very high compared to other establishments, but good for a treat!
Irish nachos are amazing

reviews.author: SteveC
reviews.reviewBody: Great meal and delicious beer. We’d definitely go back again. Only disappointment was that the music either didn’t happen or was too quiet to be heard!

reviews.author: AnthonyL
reviews.reviewBody: First time dining here. Portions were bloody massive! Atmosphere is great with the live music. Staff were friendly, venue was clean, food was delicious.

reviews.author: AnnB
reviews.reviewBody: They didn’t have my reservation, the host said “yeah, we don’t actually get the reservations from that system”. So we were placed on the third floor, completely and totally away from the music in a brightly lite part of the pub where they put large loud groups. We ordered one drink and left. It was terrible. Ruined our night, we couldn’t get a table anywhere else either so we ended up going home. Very disappointing.

reviews.author: TristanC
reviews.reviewBody:
I placed a reservation on a Saturday night because I know it can be busy and a lot of restaurants are facing a labour shortage. When I arrived I was told that they didn't have my reservation even though I received email confirmation for it. I was simply told they didn't have a table for my guests and myself and no accommodations were made to make up for it other than offering seats outside as it was literally just starting to rain (not exaggerating). I called the next day and left my name and number as they ask you to do in their voicemail, and I never received a call back. I called more than once.

I don't think I'll be dining here as they don't answer their phone to confirm reservations, yet their reservation system is broken. I previously worked in the restaurant industry so I've seen it all and I remained calm and considerate in all of my interactions with this restaurant, and it seemed that my courtesy was not at all reciprocated.

reviews.author: DavidP
reviews.reviewBody: Great way to book a table using this service, decent service, but always difficult to hear through masks, good selection of beers, love Kilkenny, one in my party had Murphys stout n loved it, Lamb burger was awesome had it with sweet potato fries with a Mayo curry dip which were homemade n crispy, so good. Fish n chips awesome, tasty nice batter, good haddock. Ham chicken leek pastie absolutely fantastic, a well made dish. Awesome dinner out Thanks to all at The Old Triangle, Halifax

reviews.author: Schaefcand
reviews.reviewBody: We arrived on time and were greeted and the COVID routine of checking ID and Vaccination status was performed in a proficient manner. Live Irish music had already started and was wonderful as to find live music today is a bit of a challenge. Wide variety of local beers on tap and bottles are available including ciders. Food assortment was plenty and we selected fried Haddock, Fish and Chips and Seafood pasta all of which were plentiful, nicely presented, and flavorful. The seafood chowder was one of the best we encountered while on our maritime visit. All in all good food, good music, good atmosphere makes the Old Triangle a winner and a come back to place!

reviews.author: HeatherL
reviews.reviewBody: WE had a last minute change in our reservations and with a phone call the staff went out of their way to accommodate us

reviews.author: JeffH
reviews.reviewBody:
The food was good; fresh and decent portions.  Lamb burger was properly cooked, as were the potato wedges with it;  pan fried haddock was also properly cooked to tender and the salad with blueberry vinegrette was tasty (though the pieces of cucumber and apple were sliced waaay too large to eat without first cutting them!|).  Very best part of dinner??  The warm gingerbread cake with whiskey drizzle... stuff dreams are made of --- do not miss having this dessert.

Ambiance was warm, friendly and inclusive.  Server was very attentive and she paid attention;  entertainer was awesome, upbeat and on point with songs to keep the room right in his pocket.  Fantastic night!!

reviews.author: EvaC
reviews.reviewBody: Not too noisy - seated 2nd level. Excellent service - not pushy. Good food.

reviews.author: PierreL
reviews.reviewBody: Nice place, good service and good food, 👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼👍🏼

reviews.author: DebbiK
reviews.reviewBody: Good food and service despite COVID.  Would recommend

reviews.author: Geoff
reviews.reviewBody: Just what we were looking for on a Friday evening. Band was good food was good beer Wes even better lol

reviews.author: Kacey28
reviews.reviewBody: Service was ok and the food was better than I expected. I had the seafood chowder, which was pretty good, but was lukewarm, hubby had the steak and said it was decent. In the end it was an enjoyable evening with friends.

reviews.author: BrittanyL
reviews.reviewBody: It would be nice if there could be speakers or a screen upstairs with who’s playing downstairs.

reviews.author: WesleyB
reviews.reviewBody: The food was excellent and the service was very good.  Everyone followed covid protocol

reviews.author: Susanc
reviews.reviewBody: Always good, some choices great, some not so much. Service friendly and prompt.

reviews.author: ShellyD
reviews.reviewBody: In spite of receiving 3 confirmations, my reservation was not made at the establishment.   This was very disappointing

reviews.author: MacM
reviews.reviewBody: We enjoyed the steak and kidney triangle.  My wife enjoyed the house wine and I really enjoyed the Kilkenney beer.  Look forward to returning soon.

reviews.author: SydneyB
reviews.reviewBody: Such a comfortable retreat as always! Great service and delicious menu choices available even in these socially restricted times. If I lived on the peninsula , I would make this pub a weekly event for supper and music.

reviews.author: ChrisM
reviews.reviewBody: Food was great and the music was as well overall a great experience

reviews.author: DonG
reviews.reviewBody: Very good as always even with COVID protocol. Nice evening with great food and service. Door man could have been a bit nicer but the rest of service was spot on.

reviews.author: MelanieM
reviews.reviewBody: It was perfect, like it always is.  One of my favourite places in the city.

reviews.author: EdwardT
reviews.reviewBody: awesome nachos, good portion sizes for the kids meals

reviews.author: JEFFC
reviews.reviewBody: Went to an Irish pub for the music and it was a loud not great rock band

reviews.author: HeatherH
reviews.reviewBody: This place is a gem! The food, ambience, and service are great and the live music is terrific.

reviews.author: RodL
reviews.reviewBody: Very nice pub with good music and service.  One of my wife's fish was not fresh and smelt a bit off but the second piece was good.  I had the Dublin Pastry which has pulled chicken.  I got a hard piece of the chicken cartridge in what was a tasty dish.  I think the cooks need to take a bit more care in their food.  We did enjoy our time there despite the food issues.

reviews.author: RaymondC
reviews.reviewBody: Add more smoked salmon to the Eggs Benny! Quantity was less than usual!!’

reviews.author: DanV
reviews.reviewBody: Very enjoyable evening with live music.  Food was fantastic

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: The food was good , it was really busy when I went so the service was a bit slow and talk fast lol because if you don’t the waiter will be gone in a flash . Drinks are pricey and I think the decor could have been a little less dinchey , but the food alone was very good I would probably do a take out order from this place if I were to go back .

reviews.author: ErinS
reviews.reviewBody: We love this pub. The food is always great, the staff are very engaged with the customers and always friendly. The atmosphere is energetic and upbeat. Definitely recommend this spot! Great for a group of friends or a dinner date (they also have a kids menu, and my kids love it there too)

reviews.author: AvaS
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, great food and especially great value with the dine around halifax deal!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great service, excellent entertainment, ease of booking our reservation and good follow up from the manager. We had a table on their 3rd floor, an excellent space.

reviews.author: Dave
reviews.reviewBody: Food was reasonably good and there was a great selection of beer on tap. Live music was good but you can't see the band from many if the seats so its less engaging. Overall worth a try.

reviews.author: AlleyneB
reviews.reviewBody: I had the pan grilled haddock which was perfectly done; hardly any coating which is what I like and perfectly cooked. The lovely garden salad had a chipotle vinaigrette which was delicious. The accompanying coleslaw was a bit different - not creamy glop but varied and  with a light vinaigrette was well - very good!

reviews.author: RayM
reviews.reviewBody: Good food reasonable prices excellent service clean premises

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great Robbie Burns night! We’ll be back next year (and before then too!)

reviews.author: RaymondC
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent as usual. Good to come back to a comfortable place. Ray

reviews.author: KatieG
reviews.reviewBody: We always have an awesome time at The Old Triangle!  Great music, food and service as always.

sections.title: Sparkling Vino
sections.description: Prosecco, Spumante, Frizzante, Champagne, etc

items.title: Prosecco | Glera | Itinera - Veneto, Italy
items.desc: This is a beautifully fresh and well-balanced Prosecco with plenty of enticing flavours of pear and peach. Soft, gentle bubbles carry light, floral notes across the palate. Pretty, aromatic bouquet, fresh fruity flavour and a gentle mousse make this Prosecco an it an ideal aperitif for parties and celebrations. It offers good quality at an excellent price tag

sections.title: Vino Bianco (White Wine)
sections.description: From Old World to New World. All our wines and spirits by he bottle are ready for take out! Come try some of our consignment wines!

items.title: Cortese | Villa Sparino - Gavi, Piedmont
items.desc: Aromas of white blossoms, stone fruit and fresh herbs. Medium weight and dry on the palate with a lightly oily though the wine remains lively and fresh marked by green apple, lemon drop, peach, fresh herbs and minerality. The finish is long and pleasant. Wonderful concentration and balance. "This is always a top Gavi and 2018 doesn't disappoint. Loads of thyme, parsley, citrus and daffodils. Lovely density and spiciness add to the otherwise sleek and finely tuned palate. Drink now." 92 pts James Suckling

items.title: Chardonnay | Rocca Di Castagnoli Molino Delle Balze Chianti Classico - Tuscany, Italy
items.desc: This wine is proof that Tuscany can produce very high quality Chardonnay. It displays intense stone fruit and citrus on the nose, wonderful minerality and acidity, a round texture and long finish

items.title: Chardonnay | Brocard Chablis Sainte Claire - Chablis, Burgundy
items.desc: This current vintage offers floral and citrus aromas, a palate of great finesse and lively acidity on the finish. A very polished wine

items.title: Blends | Fuedo Di Santa Tresa Rina Ianca - Vittoria, Sicily
items.desc: Grape blends of Grillo & Viognier. Rina Ianca has a bouquet of tropical fruits, with hints of vanilla. The palate is beautifully balanced between ripe fruit and racy acidity, resulting in a wine which has plenty of character. Rina Ianca makes an ideal aperitif. In Sicily, one would enjoy it with Spaghetti alle Vongole (spaghetti with clams)

items.title: Bianco | Blends | Luckettes Tidal Bay - Wolfville, Nova Scotia
items.desc: Grapes blend of 65% L'Acadie Blanc, 25% Seyval, 5% Ortega, and 5% Vidal. On the nose, fresh citrus notes, with subtle hints of wildflower. On the palate, this wine dryish, clean & crisp with hints of key lime zest, green apple and pear. The perfect pairing with local lobster and scallops, fresh light pastas, and artisan cheeses. Best served chilled

items.title: Sauvignon Blanc | Spy Valley - Marlborough/South Island, New Zealand
items.desc: Passion fruit, ripe melon, herbal notes and hints of mineral come through on the nose. The fruit follows on the palate with great weight and crisp acidity

items.title: Pinot Grigio | Villa San Martino - Veneto, Italy
items.desc: Fruity, balanced with notes of pear and almonds

items.title: Pinot Grigio | IL Padrino - Terre Siciliane, Sicily
items.desc: A crisp, clean and refreshing Pinot Grigio. It's easy drinking style and larger format make it an ideal house wine- especially when we need our wine orders to last a little longer

items.title: Chardonnay | Calmel & Joseph - Cotê de Roussillon, France
items.desc: The Villa Blanche Chardonnay has a delicate nose of white peach, dried apricots and floral notes. It is medium bodied and round in the mouth balanced fruit and acid and just a whisper of spice and oak

sections.title: Vino Rosso (Red Wine)
sections.description: From Old World to New World. All our wines and spirits by he bottle are ready for take out! Come try some of our consignment wines!

items.title: Nebbiolo | Ascheri Borolo - Piedmont, Italy
items.desc: Gorgeous garnet red colour. A layered bouquet of sweet spices, dried flowers, leather and underbrush. Well structured and elegant tannins, powerful with lots of length

items.title: Super Tuscan | Brancaia Tré Rosso - Tuscany, Italy
items.desc: Perfect blend of Sangiovese, Merlot and Cabernet Sauvignon. A balanced with lots of fruit intensity on the nose; aromas of raspberry and blackberry and hints of coffee and fresh flowers. The palate is medium to full-bodied, with velvety tannins and a long, pleasing finish

items.title: Sangiovese | Villa Caffagio Chianti Classico - Tuscany, Italy
items.desc: Pretty aromas of dried flowers, raspberries and sweet spices abound. The palate is medium bodied, dry with lively acidity and fine grained tannins. Flavours of black cherry, plum, tea leaves and savoury spice characterize the wine

items.title: Sangiovese | Fontella Chianti Classico - Tuscany, Italy
items.desc: The wine is ruby red, with a typical Chianti nose, smooth, medium-bodied palate, bright red fruit, some fresh herbal character and pleasant balanced finish

items.title: Corvino Blend | Zenato Amarone Della Valpolicella Classico - Veneto, Italy
items.desc: Apassimento wine made with the robust blend of Croatina, Oseleta, Corvina and Rondinella. This Amarone is concentrated with aromas and flavours of preserved cherries and bay leaf. Superbly rich and plush on the palate with very soft creamy tannins and a lingering finish. Impressively balanced and can easily be enjoyed now, though has enough structure to age further in the bottle

items.title: Corvina Blend | Brigaldara Valpolicella - Veneto, Italy
items.desc: Corvina 55%, Corvinone 25%, Rondinella 20% sourced from the Marcellise and Brigaldara vineyards at 150-200 meters above sea level. Bright ruby. Vibrant aromas of redcurrant, blackberry and candied violet on the knockout nose. Quite juicy on the palate, with floral red berry flavors given laser-like precision by lovely harmonious acidity. Very well balanced wine, clean and clear

items.title: Malbec | Aruma - Mendoza, Argentina
items.desc: Deep reddish color. The nose shows a great aromatic intensity where we find white flowers, red fruits and cherries. On the palate the wine is fresh, fruity, and it also expresses a pleasant balance between acidity, tannins and softness. The finish is long and delicate

items.title: Malbec | Trapiche Estacion - Mendoza, Argentina
items.desc: This Malbec shows aromas of black fruit, jam and licorice, with an elegant touch of smoke, vanilla and chocolate. On the palate the flavours of dark fruit mix with medium tannins. The flavours carry onto a long finish

items.title: Cabernet Sauvignon | Black Stallion - Napa Valley, California
items.desc: This Cabernet Sauvignon boasts deep cherry and plum flavour with elegant supple tannins

items.title: Cabernet Sauvignon | Noble Vines 337 - Lodi, California
items.desc: Noble Vines 337 Cabernet Sauvignon exhibits lively aromas of black cherry, ripe currant, fresh herbs and lightly roasted coffee. Supple tannins and balanced acidity support core flavours of blackberry, black cherry and toasty oak, intertwined with spicy black pepper accents. It is rich and complex and may be enjoyed on its own or with a range of cuisine

items.title: Blends | IL Padrino - Terre Siciliane, Sicily
items.desc: Southern Sicilian red wine blends with Merlot, Sangiovese, Nero d' Avola. This medium bodied and fruity Sicilian red wine is the quintessential house wine and perfect for staying home, where its litre format goes a little bit further than a standard bottle

sections.title: Rosato (Rosé Wine)
sections.description: From Old World to New World. All our wines and spirits by he bottle are ready for take out! Come try some of our consignment wines!

items.title: Blends | Zenato "Bardolino Chiaretto" - Veneto, Italy
items.desc: Grape blends of Corvina, Merlot, Rondinella. This wine has a strong personality, offering notes of raspberries and blackcurrants with grassy undertones that are mirrored harmoniously in the mouth. On the palate, it is delicate and balanced with structured acidity and a lingering sweet almond finish

overview: Trattoria da Claudio's Chef & owner Claudio Pontorno, has a very AUTHENTIC point of view when it comes to the food of his birthplace and childhood, being that of Italy more specifically Sicily.  After having a successful food establishment just outside of Rome for 10 years, Halifax is lucky to have Chef Claudio & his mouth watering creations. Claudio's vision for the Trattoria, is to create an AUTHENTIC ITALIAN dining experience in the heart of Halifax, using as much fresh & locally sourced products as possible. Our recipes have been handcrafted by the chef from those he has learned from over the years working throughout Italy, but always with what he learned from the true heart of Italian cuisine, Mothers, Grandmothers and extended family of ones Italian home kitchen. To our valued customers we ask for your cooperation in not asking for changes or substitutions of items on our menu. We are happy to accommodate allergies / dietary needs, when & where possible advance notice please.

reviews.author: AmandaL
reviews.reviewBody:
Food was amazing and service was great. 
Atmosphere leaves a little to be desired as it was super lit up. Would have preferred a more dim lighting.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: One of the best meals I’ve ever had in Halifax! Highly recommend!

reviews.author: Guest
reviews.reviewBody:
Simply the best Italian food restaurant in the City.  Right from the Antipasti to the the desert, the food takes your taste buds on a journey of complete satisfaction.  the wine pairing really brought out the other hidden seasonings as recommended by our respectful server Avery.  Claudio, "the food artist" himself, took a few minutes to check in to see how the meal was going and instantly caught his passion and zeal for good cooking.  Hats off to the team for some very authentic Italian cuisine.
C&D of Halifax.

reviews.author: LadyClark007
reviews.reviewBody:
Our first time eating at this establishment.
The food was delicious 
The service excellent 
The owner delightful 
The manager charming
Thank you
We will be returning very soon!

reviews.author: DavidW
reviews.reviewBody: We had a wonderful evening! Great food and drinks, wonderful ambiance, we’ll definitely be back!

reviews.author: Donny
reviews.reviewBody:
Great food with a varied and inventive menu. Impeccable service. 
We look forward to exploring the rest of the menu.

reviews.author: dartmouthbarb
reviews.reviewBody: The food was amazing. So delicious

reviews.author: HaliGal
reviews.reviewBody: Really great food and really great service - couldn't ask for more.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Claudio is charming . We loved the ambience and the food was fabulous

reviews.author: IWONAM
reviews.reviewBody:
The food was delicious and very filling. The "amuses bouches" and little touches over dinner (prosecco etc.) were a very welcome touch. The house wine - both white and red - was delicious. My husband raved over the chicken dish, both my son and his fiancee had pasta and really loved it, and I had Claudio's special of the day, which was amazing. We did not have room for dessert, but the dining experience was absolutely wonderful. Thank you and I am sure we will be back!
I have already recommended your place to others!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Claudio and his staff showed us an exceptional time and the food was wonderful!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Chef and staff were awesome!  Great food and looking forward to going back there again.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great place to have dinner.  Chef is great and staff was fantastic.  Had a great thick cut pork chop.

overview: Claudine's Eatery is, put simply, East Coast comfort food.​ Family owned and operated by a mother/daughter duo. We pride ourselves on creating real food, not fast food.

reviews.author: OliviaC
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing as always!

reviews.author: Sherry
reviews.reviewBody: Awesome Eggs Benny.  Eggs were cooked soft boiled perfectly. Delicious hollandaise sauce.

reviews.author: GeorgeM
reviews.reviewBody: This restaurant has become a must stop for us whenever our travels take us to or through Fredericton. It is very easy to find with ample free parking outside the restaurant. We have enjoyed both breakfast and dinner there. Claudine’s serves one of the very best Eggs Benedict I’ve ever had. And they offer several excellent varieties of Eggs Benedict.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great food and great service!

reviews.author: AMarie
reviews.reviewBody: Service was great and the food was delicious! We will be back soon,

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Very enjoyable dinner.

reviews.author: MandyC
reviews.reviewBody: As always, excellent food and service! Definitely the city's best breakfast spot!

reviews.author: KatherineC
reviews.reviewBody: Great experience. Was so impressed by the caesar options!

reviews.author: lingc
reviews.reviewBody: Great place for brunch - exceptional and engaging staff

reviews.author: GeorgeM
reviews.reviewBody: This has now become our ‘must stop’ for dinner whenever our travels take us to the Fredericton area.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great meal. Great service.

reviews.author: frankg
reviews.reviewBody: Great experience. Awesome food. Friendly staff. Best breakfast place in Fredericton.

reviews.author: PeterG
reviews.reviewBody: The food is outstanding.  It was a bit noisy mid day.  The place was full of energetic people.  But I will definitely be back!

reviews.author: EECToronto
reviews.reviewBody: We stop by whenever we are in Fredericton on our drives from Toronto to Antigonish because Claudine’s breakfast is exactly what you want/need in the morning (especially on long road trips): delicious food, hearty portions, wide and varied selection and great service. The restaurant is Scandinavian-meets-Canadian-lodge chic and feels so incredibly homey and welcoming. Claudine herself is always there when we visit and really makes her guests feel as if we’re having a meal with family. We’re en route home now and are planning a lunchtime stop tomorrow - can’t wait!

reviews.author: BeatriceM
reviews.reviewBody: Great service! Delicious food! I would definitely recommend to anyone and especially friends out of town.

reviews.author: jonathang
reviews.reviewBody: An excellent experience as usual. The waiter was great and the food was excellent!

reviews.author: DonS
reviews.reviewBody: The staff were very friendly. The food was great. We had lobster rolls with the poutine as well as the grill cheese. Everything was delicious. Save room for a piece of the chocolate cake. Well worth the extra calories.

reviews.author: Johanne
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent as usual, love this place!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: It was my first visit to Claudine's and I will definitely be back.  Friendly, attentive staff and delicious eggs benedict done a variety of ways.  It was difficult to choose but I had the Lobster Eggs Benedict.  Delicious!  Looking forward to the next trip!

reviews.author: Jenn
reviews.reviewBody: The staff were absolutely lovely. The lobster roll was chock-full of lobster and very delicious. It was a very nice little spot, the perfect place to get dressed up and go out for a brunch or lunch.

reviews.author: SheilaB
reviews.reviewBody:
Our waiter was really friendly.  It is so nice to have someone that would take a little extra time to converse  with people. 
I had the fish taco with a Caesar salad.  My Husband had the steak with fries.  Everything was really good.  Presentation?  Outstanding!!!
Thank you

reviews.author: AlecM
reviews.reviewBody: If you want eggs benedict, this is where you should go.

reviews.author: BrittanyN
reviews.reviewBody: Claudines was absolutely delicious! They have a large menu full of amazing dishes. Will have to go back to try everything! Fresh ingredients and quick service!

reviews.author: LeanneR
reviews.reviewBody: A Fredericton treasure! I can't believe it took us so long to dine there!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: great service and amazing food!

reviews.author: HaleyL
reviews.reviewBody: Fantastic service. Worth the drive from Moncton. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.author: Johanne
reviews.reviewBody: Always great!

reviews.author: MichelleD
reviews.reviewBody:
We had brunch here on the weekend and it was fantastic!

I highly recommend having a Vodka Caesar & the Lobster Eggs Benny on a homemade croissant with pan fried potatoes!

reviews.author: CaroleS
reviews.reviewBody: This is great local restaurant. The food is delicious, the service is excellent and staff very attentive.

reviews.author: BarbW
reviews.reviewBody: Greta eggs! A little chilly at our table by the door.

reviews.author: Mark
reviews.reviewBody: Claudine's never disappoints. The premiere brunch location of Fredericton.

reviews.author: Reds
reviews.reviewBody: Great food. Great hospitality. Great ambiance. Great!

reviews.author: Johanne
reviews.reviewBody: Wonderful, always enjoy going here. Food is excellent and staff is always courteous and helpful.

reviews.author: KevinM
reviews.reviewBody: Although we had a reservation it wasn’t needed, went out on Halloween evening so I assume everybody else was giving candy out, only 2 other tables were occupied. Service was quick, food was excellent and it was like we had the whole place to ourselves. Menu was somewhat small but was stripped down due to the covid, take out available also, an enjoyable evening had.

reviews.author: Stewy
reviews.reviewBody: Eggs Benedict, awesome, cooked perfect, Best in town

reviews.author: Johanne
reviews.reviewBody: Met a friend for lunch here and both had mushroom Swiss Benny. It was delicious, staff was friendly and efficient. This is a great spot to eat and needs more recognition! 👍🏻

reviews.author: Emily
reviews.reviewBody: Good selection.  Great prices. Handy location.  Excellent service.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing! Can’t wait to go back!

reviews.author: FoodieBDN
reviews.reviewBody: very pleasant lunch.  Staff very welcoming and attentive.  Good safety measures taken during COVID, much appreciated.

reviews.author: MichelleD
reviews.reviewBody: So happy that Claudine's is doing well! Great food & friendly service :)

overview:
Welcome to East Side Mario’s! We opened East Side Mario’s in 1987 to
bring a little taste of Italy to our guests. Our goal was to bring you the hospitality and passion for great food that Italians are known for around the world – and have a little fun doing it. We’ve evolved over the years, but always with a focus on giving you delicious Italian meals at great value. Good times and great Italian meals…that’s East Side Mario’s.

overview:
Your headquarters for food, sports, drinks, and late night party fun! with 40-Way Wings, a large selection of draught beers, Walls of HDTV’s playing your favourite sports - The Pint Public House Halifax.
Due to the high volume on our patios, we don't take any reservations outside. We will do our best to accommodate if there is space available at the time of your booking.

reviews.author: JoeBanker57
reviews.reviewBody: I have been at The Pint 1/2 dozen times in the last 9 months. The place was not busy when we arrived and we waited over 10 minutes for our waitress. She was pleasant and provide good service. The staff appeared distracted and were grouped at the bar and we waited. The food was delivered quickly after ordering and our waitress was attentive. Overall improvement needed.

reviews.author: JeffH
reviews.reviewBody: The Boxing Day event a the Pint has now become a new family tradition for us.

reviews.author: DeniseV
reviews.reviewBody: It took about "one hour" to have the food, and it was just wings and potato skins. The drinks (Pops, Pepsy) was flat, and after been requested a new one, it was also flat, only the third  one was a little better, and I saw other costumers returning the Pops.

reviews.author: WorkGroup
reviews.reviewBody: We explained that we were going to an event and needed to be out by a certain time.  The service was very quick and the waitress excellent.

reviews.author: EwanB
reviews.reviewBody: Great atmosphere, music by Joe Butcher was outstanding. Second best beef dip I’ve had this year. We’ll be back

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Booked for 14 people via Open Table and arrived and they didn’t have our reservation when we arrived. They did set us up on the patio but the drinks took 45min to arrive and it was a Monday and not that busy. 

In the end all were happy but not ideal  for out of town guests. 

Thanks

Jill

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Refused to honour accepted reservation because it was the NBA finals.

reviews.author: MartinH
reviews.reviewBody: Noise was only high as we were there for the Champions League final - even so we could converse easily, and despite the large crowd the service was excellent, as was the food and selection of craft beer.

reviews.author: Linda
reviews.reviewBody: Most of the food was good, but the fish batter was greasy and over-cooked, and the fish dried out. Service was slow and not good - had to hint down the waitress for the bills. Noise level was ridiculous - couldn't hear anyone

reviews.author: RQ0814
reviews.reviewBody: Made a reservation well in advance to make sure we had somewhere to eat, when we arrived at the restaurant I was told they had no reservations and asked had I confirmed with the restaurant. I then showed the email confirmation I received and was told they didn’t use Open Table for reservations and there was nothing they could do. Nothing was offered to help and no assistance in getting a table and refused to get a manager. We then had to walk around for 30+ minutes looking a place to eat. Highly disappointed in this restaurant, as we’ve never been and won’t be trying again because of the server.

reviews.author: EwanB
reviews.reviewBody: Very happy with both the beef dip, the wings and the Black Angus beer

overview:
Relax in our cozy restaurant and indulge your inner gastronome.
Enjoy one of our signature cocktails or explore our climate controlled wine cellar.
We offer a large selection of fresh seafood, pasta, veal, steak, pizza and chicken dishes.
2 separate dining rooms are available for private parties from 15 people up to 65, extensive bar selections with a deep wine cellar specializing in Italian, French and Californian wines.

Proudly serving you for over 27 years!

reviews.author: BepD
reviews.reviewBody: We always have a great meal there, with outstanding service.

reviews.author: PamG
reviews.reviewBody:
Excellent service. Extremely loud though. Couldn’t hear anyone at our table.

I try the calamari everywhere I go… and theirs was underwhelming and not what I expected. The steak I ordered was great.

reviews.author: LizH
reviews.reviewBody: Always a classic! Enjoyed our meal, service was wonderful, friendly and efficient even surrounded by Christmas parties!

reviews.author: MissySze
reviews.reviewBody: To start the night off, the restaurant didn’t see our reservation for 10 people. They were quite busy but luckily, they had space in their lounge area for our group. Our group was also late getting together so we didn’t mind that we had to wait until almost 8:00pm to get our table. After sifting down, we had ordered a drinks, it took a little while to get our first round. Although, we were a large group (total 8 people showed up for dinner) we had ordered our food, some had appetizers before their mains but our mains took over an hour before it was served. A few of us ordered the ‘special’ of that evening, turns out there was only two ‘left’ and three of us ordered. Still, we waited quite a while to get our food. Finally, when the food came out, the food was PURE salt. I changed my ‘special’ which was a striploin into a tenderloin meal, added the side of shrimps and scallops and everything - the steak, shrimps and scallops was SO salty, it literally left a bitter aftertaste. This was common between everyone else’s dish - just salty. Also, my steak was cooked to a medium instead of a medium rare but after waiting so long - just not worth it to complain. The cut of the tenderloin wasn’t great either - pretty gritty. The restaurant ‘normally’ closes at 9:00pm but we were there until past 10:00pm so even when we were finished eating, none of our group wanted dessert but there wasn’t an option for another round of drinks because they were already closed. The only person who had dessert was the one who complained about the saltiness of her lasagna and had the dessert as her main over getting any other main dish replacement. I’ve dined here before a month prior for a business meeting and it was good, so I recommended it to my out of town friends since it was a special occasion for us to get together again after 10 years, but this experience was just a disappointment and the food expectation was terrible. Only good thing was our server was very friendly and professional.

reviews.author: SeanB
reviews.reviewBody:
We enjoyed our meal and celebrating our 29th wedding anniversary at Care Chianti.

thank you

reviews.author: BepD
reviews.reviewBody: Always a special evening! The food is excellent, the service is wonderful, and the room we were in is very quiet.

reviews.author: DavidI
reviews.reviewBody: Two hours to get our main. Forgot one order. Food was not tasty and overpriced

reviews.author: BepD
reviews.reviewBody: We had a great meal, and the service was outstanding.

reviews.author: ABAinNS
reviews.reviewBody: Exceptional food, service and value.

reviews.author: Spago27
reviews.reviewBody: Fantastic food, home made ravioli. Very generous portions. Awesome dining experience. Have been going here for a very long time. Highly recommend

reviews.author: Sandbag
reviews.reviewBody:
Great food
Great service
Will return, one of my favourite restaurants in the city.

reviews.author: SharonG
reviews.reviewBody: Our waitress made the evening very special . The food was spectacular

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Once seated everything was great. But there were a large number of people waiting at the entrance for a table and we were not able to socially distance with others without being outside in the cold. Also we had to wait 15 minutes beyond our reservation time. Perhaps they need to leave more time between reservations to ensure the table is ready on time which would reduce the wait line at the entrance.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Cafe Chianti is an amazing restaurant. Best fine dining in Halifax. The food, service and ambiance never disappoints!

reviews.author: NickiT
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing. One of the best steaks I’ve had in my life!!

reviews.author: ARDENTTRAVELER
reviews.reviewBody:
Valentines - food was Delish and good social distancing -
Music was a bit too loud but truly a good experience

reviews.author: Irish
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing fresh pasta dishes, authentic Italian, great wine list.

reviews.author: DominicD
reviews.reviewBody: It was a first experience for my spouse and I, and we truly loved it. We will keep Café Chianti at the top of our list for eating out. Excellent all around!

reviews.author: BrentH
reviews.reviewBody: After 10 years in Halifax it's still our favourite place for a nice dinner out!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: We haven’t been here in a long time, but it used to be one of our favs. After tonight, it’s back on our list of fav places to go. Our server was lovely and the food was just as good. We both had the arugula salad and it was delicious! I had the butternut squash ravioli and Glen had the spaghetti and meatballs. We both really enjoyed it. A lovely night out. ❤️ we will be back soon!

reviews.author: WayneA
reviews.reviewBody:
Elegant setting in a historic downtown building.  The food and service were top notch. 
Will go back and would highly recommend.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Saturday evening meal (x5), on the 2000 second sitting. Good table, socially separated and a nice warm room. Lots of choices and food was well presented and of good quality. This restaurant is quieter than the busier part of Halifax but we liked this. Recommended

reviews.author: lisaN
reviews.reviewBody: Again a stellar performance from the kitchen and staff. I can’t gush enough about the new vegetarian pasta options. Food is always too notch and service likewise. The environment is clean and Covid 19 in tune. I as a cancer client I look forward to takeout as our Covid  numbers rise.

reviews.author: lisaN
reviews.reviewBody: The new fall menu has added an extra veggie pasta. The ravioli was so rich and yummy. The cocktails were well made and wine selection as always, well rounded. Love this restaurant, for me best Italian in Halifax.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Always consistent. Great service, great food

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Great food and atmosphere!

reviews.author: JimK
reviews.reviewBody: Great overall experience! Never disappointing.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: My dish wasn’t great seafood pasta but they had burnt the garlic so very bitter taste.

reviews.author: MichelleC
reviews.reviewBody: It was great, not our usual great, chicken was a bit dry and the food wait was a bit long.  However, still my favorite restaurant.  Blackened Haddock was awesome!  Thanks to our waitress, due to the wait, had an extra glass of wine!!

reviews.author: Cakes99
reviews.reviewBody: We love the table by the window. Quiet spot. Tim, our server, was excellent! Always a great meal!

reviews.author: WRFG
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent birthday dinner

reviews.author: dksci29
reviews.reviewBody: They were just amazing and the food was wonderful

reviews.author: TheBigFizz
reviews.reviewBody: Great meal, great service, great ambiance and we will be back!

reviews.author: ABAinNS
reviews.reviewBody: Classic Italian fare, very flavourful, served with attentive service and a commitment to the little details.  The pasta dishes are highly recommended, and not a morsel of pizza was left on anyone's plate.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Amazing restaurant-great atmosphere and the best Italian cuisine in the city!

reviews.author: AkbarKhan
reviews.reviewBody: A great place to eat, good food service and ambience

reviews.author: BeeWebb
reviews.reviewBody: We eat here fairly often. It is loud, especially in the large dining area. We prefer to sit on the bar side where it's a bit more intimate and quieter. Service is hit and miss...sometimes friendly, sometimes not so much, sometimes very attentive and sometimes too busy for one server at seemingly too many tables. Food is always delicious though.

reviews.author: Ginny
reviews.reviewBody: Beautiful setting and ambiance decent prices too :) we bought on groupon but woukd def go back :)

reviews.author: Kathy
reviews.reviewBody: This is a great restaurant with food that is consistently well prepared, and the service is terrific. It is a great place to take a date, or your family for an elegant evening out.

reviews.author: ShandaG
reviews.reviewBody: Enjoyed our evening and meal at Cafe Chianti. The wine, food, and service were wonderful! My boyfriend and I felt we had an intimate yet relaxed and private setting as we were given the option to sit by the window next to the bar. This made for a perfect date night! The highback chairs were classy and comfortable.  Highly recommend the lobster ravioli. It was to die for!

overview:
Showcasing regional seafood and game in intimate dining rooms, a best kept secret and a favorite retreat for those serious about food.

For reservations for 5 guests or more, please call us directly.

Rated 2 of 3 stars in 2019 Where to Eat in Canada.

Each and every facet of a dining experience has a story. From the pedigree of our food products, our partnerships with indigenous farmers, foragers and fishermen, to our guests who choose to celebrate their “continuing story” with us.

Private dining room available.

reviews.author: MargeM
reviews.reviewBody: The food was fantastic. The chef respected the delicacy of the seafood -perfect blend of flavours . We are going again -second consecutive night. Lovely quiet atmosphere and the perfect level of service. Strongly recommend to friends and family who appreciate a great dining experience.

reviews.author: BruceC
reviews.reviewBody: Another Wonderful meal in this fabulous little spot. The food was top notch, the service was excellent and the ambiance lovely. Definitely high on our Halifax recommendation list

reviews.author: Peter
reviews.reviewBody: The most amazing meal I have had in years! The scallops were particularly amazing. The service was wonderful and the ambiance was intimate and cozy.

reviews.author: MrMac
reviews.reviewBody:
Malcolm was our server. Very knowledgeable on each menu item. Super service.
Cocktails mixed properly and served in a nice sized glass. Wine selection...class A.
All courses were beautifully plated. Food was delicious and cooked to perfection.
Hot veggies......imagine that! 
Desserts and cheese plate so good! Thank you all and see you soon.

reviews.author: CarolA
reviews.reviewBody: Friendly comfortable fine dining.  Food is absolutely divine!

reviews.author: EllenK
reviews.reviewBody: The food was amazing, Malcolm's service was personable and friendly. Everything was great!

reviews.author: Mama60
reviews.reviewBody: It was the best such a lovely evening, it was our Anniversary 33 years. We have celebrated so many times at Stories and the food, service everything is always perfect. Thank you for you for such an outstanding restaurant we call our own in Halifax.

reviews.author: ItaliaHalifax
reviews.reviewBody: Just exceptional.  We (my wife and I) have been to Stories on occasion in the past several years, and it remains a true fine dining experience.  The setting and ambience make it a great spot for a romantic dinner.  This past weekend was our first visit there in a few years, and the food was absolutely exceptional.  Starters and the Faroe Island Salmon entrees were exquisite.  Notably,  the menu is not large...but it is safe to say they seem to have perfected everything on it. We will definitely return again to this top-tier restaurant in Halifax.  Highly recommended...

reviews.author: Bobthefish
reviews.reviewBody: My wife and I had dinner at Stories and it was a lovely evening. The only suggestion would be that there could be a little background noise so that the other 2 tables wouldn't be able to listen to everything we were saying.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: It was amazing

reviews.author: HungryCdn
reviews.reviewBody: We had a wonderfully memorable evening at Stories! The food & service were both impeccable. So much so that we are already yearning for another visit back, soon! This was a father & son get-together, which we will remember fondly for a long time.

reviews.author: JenniferS
reviews.reviewBody: I highly recommend this restaurant. Everything about our meal was outstanding, including our lovely server Kelsey.

reviews.author: KendallB
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent food and service!

reviews.author: ShannonW
reviews.reviewBody: The food and atmosphere are impeccable at Stories. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: DonaldM
reviews.reviewBody:
When you enter Stories, everything is spotless and wee maintained.
We were 2 couples and we had a private room so we had a wonderful evening to catch-up with friends.
The food was prepared perfectly and presentation was excellent.
Best experience in a restaurant in a long time

reviews.author: PamelaS
reviews.reviewBody: What a jewel.  Top marks across the board - the warm welcome, the decor, our waitress Kelsey who was a joy & the  food exquisite taste sensations.  We experienced why it is #1.  Come with a good appetite& savour every bite.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: The food, service and ambiance were five star. Don’t hesitate to dine here.

reviews.author: Foodie123
reviews.reviewBody: Great service and truly delicious food — the best in Halifax if you want a more upscale evening out.

reviews.author: JeffP
reviews.reviewBody: Absolutely superb food quality, taste and presentation. We ordered our red wine first so that it could be opened up and allowed to breathe. I don't think the server understood this. The wine was opened once we asked for it with our first course. A small point, however, we ordered a wine that would have benefited from decanting prior to serving. This does not stop me from planning another meal there and if needed, ask specifically, that the wine be decanted. Did I say the appetizers, mains, and desserts were superb?  Well done!!!!

reviews.author: SusanJ
reviews.reviewBody:
We had an excellent meal and evening. The quality and presentation of the food and the service were outstanding.
The restaurant is small so I would recommend making a reservation.

reviews.author: PamS
reviews.reviewBody: Food was excellent and our waitress was pleasant and attentive

reviews.author: Ryan
reviews.reviewBody: Food was very tasty. Friendly and informative staff.

reviews.author: LadyClark007
reviews.reviewBody:
Our 26th wedding Anniversary and we came for Diner
Food was fabulous 
Malcolm our server was fabulous 
Music was fabulous 
Evening was fabulous 
Did I say Fabulous 
Yep summed it up nicely 🤩

reviews.author: WayneB
reviews.reviewBody: As usual, great food, great service, great value. This is our go to restaurant.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Our first time at Stories.  Decided to try it due to the rave reviews.  It didn’t disappoint, food was impeccable.  My only criticism (very minor) is that I found our table a bit small and would have preferred a view.  But it was nice and quiet and is our next “go to” place for an elegant, fairly priced meal.

reviews.author: ElmarieP
reviews.reviewBody: We really enjoyed our dining experience at Stories. The warm welcome, private dining room, ambience and our lovely server together with the exceptional high quality dishes made for a memorable dinner. We really enjoyed the scallops wrapped in rice paper, the bison carpaccio and goat’s cheese starters, and the guinea hen, salmon and duck entrees were delicious! Would love to go back for another meal. Highly recommended!

reviews.author: KatieM
reviews.reviewBody: Food was excellent, service was excellent, environment was charming!!

reviews.author: AllanK
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent dining experience all around! Fantastic chef and great service!

reviews.author: RogerC
reviews.reviewBody: Ideal location and facility if you are looking for a private and comfortable dining experience.

reviews.author: Penwid
reviews.reviewBody:
This hidden gem is attached to The Halliburton Hotel. The unpretentious  menu is concise ensuring that each dish is both excellent to taste and beautifully presented. 
Our last visit coincided with the COVID-19 restrictions so the decor was stripped down to ensure compliance but not at the expense of a fine dining experience.         
If you are looking for an excellent meal this will deliver.

reviews.author: BethP
reviews.reviewBody: Everything was wonderful.  The server was attentive but could have been more friendly.  Also, it was a fantastic place to go at this time.  Our party of four was in our own separate little room.

reviews.author: MariaL
reviews.reviewBody: We were looking for a Valentine's day resto and we definitely found the perfect place for that in Halifax. Such a wonderful display of delicate flavors and a variety of textures to please our senses. The chef showed quite an astounding mastery of his craft and has been at the helm for many years. The waitress was so considerate, nice, professionnal and willing to explain every aspects of the menu. If you are looking for a date and a great meal, I highly recommend Stories. It will be part of your story as it now is a part of ours.

reviews.author: ClaudiaB
reviews.reviewBody: Good food, great service and a warm, cozy setting. And they take the health measures with regards to stopping the spread of covid very seriously, which is an aspect of dining nowadays I never thought I would also have to mention in a review...

reviews.author: Tony
reviews.reviewBody: It was a treat to return to Stories after a year. The service, food and ambience were just as exceptional as we remembered.

reviews.author: AmyP
reviews.reviewBody: The food was amazing and interesting. The ambiance was great and felt very safe.  The service was top notch.  A great combo of tending to our needs without interrupting our party's conversation.  I LOVED this place and cannot wait to return.

reviews.author: MikeC
reviews.reviewBody: Excellent service and food. Favourite dining experience.

reviews.author: RPDRT
reviews.reviewBody: What a wonderful experience! Very few restaurants are able to maintain this level of consistently high quality service year, over year, over year. I would absolutely rate Stories as my number one dining experience in Halifax.

reviews.author: Whatsheeatingnow
reviews.reviewBody: Wonderful atmosphere and excellent food and service. House wine is excellent.

reviews.author: sharonF
reviews.reviewBody: A wonderful culinary delight ....a delicious  retreat in a sea of the normal dining experiences.

reviews.author: CarolM
reviews.reviewBody: We had a lovely dinner. Our food was delicious and we appreciated the attentive service and the quiet atmosphere.

overview:
La Piazza Ristorante offers fresh Wood Oven Pizza and chef approved Entrées and Appetizers with your favorite Wines.
You can wind down and try one of our many unique Coffee Blends with rich flavors and aromas to make your senses smile.

reviews.author: BillV
reviews.reviewBody:
Enjoyed our meal and excellent service in this neighbourhood restaurant off the beaten track.  Well worth the few blocks away from downtown and has plenty of nearby street parking in a residential area.
The portions are large (we will do more sharing next time) and food is tasty.  The calamari is very spicy which I really enjoyed but too hot for the wife.  My Funghi pizza was a little bland but the 3 others at our table enjoyed their other choices.

reviews.author: eneemeenemineemo
reviews.reviewBody:
Really enjoyed our meal, cosy small restaurant. Friendly staff. Meals were tasty and nicely presented. Was really busy, surprising for a Sunday night, we we’re glad we had a reservation. 
My only complaint was that all our cappuccinos were cold...need to froth the milk longer!

reviews.author: ShannonM
reviews.reviewBody: Delicious food, great service. Will be returning! :)

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Post Wedding dress shopping!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Piazza  is always great, but nobody there heard of open table.  Lol.

reviews.author: CyndiJ
reviews.reviewBody: We held a family birthday celebration here for 15 adults on the evening of Sat, July 13th, and we were all very pleased with the venue, food, and especially the dedicated service. I live in NB and had never been to Las Piazza Resto Cafe before -- I selected the restaurant solely based on it coming up as a recommendation from OpenTable when the original restaurant I tried to book was unavailable. Fortunately, everything worked out very well and we had the upstairs area to ourselves which was perfect. For the main course, several people in our party had the pizza which looked delicious, while the rest of us enjoyed a variety of other different entrees. There was something for everyone on the menu at various price points, and all seemed happy with their meal and the portion size. Prices appeared to be very reasonable for the type and quality of food that was served. It was a great evening and I look forward to going back on a future trip to Halifax. Thank you to our servers for a job well done! (Note: the only hiccup was when I called to confirm my reservation on Friday for Saturday evening. The restaurant did not have record of it. Fortunately, they were still ble to accommodate us. If you reserve through OpenTable, it may be prudent to call to make sure they have the reservation.)

reviews.author: DavidJudyL
reviews.reviewBody: We LOVED La Piazza!  We were celebrating a rare family visit, and we couldn’t have found a better spot to celebrate. Excellent service and delicious pizzas with a crisp and airy crust. Leftovers were just as crisp and airy the next day! A well-constructed menu with all the Mediterranean favourites; the wine selection was well chosen and affordable. We’ll be back!!

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Fantastic service. Good order was a bit delayed; however we were a large party and restaurant was quite busy. Our waitress continually checked on us and kept us updated on the status of our order(S). Pizza was very good - thin crust and very authentic.

reviews.author: DaleM
reviews.reviewBody: Loved the food. Loved the atmosphere. Loved the service. Took friends there as they had never been and they were thrilled to find such an Italian gem outside the downtown core!

reviews.author: Nich
reviews.reviewBody: The food was fabulous, service was very well timed. Cosy ambience. Very enjoyable dinner.

reviews.author: CarolynB
reviews.reviewBody: Service was competent and polite, but our food was rushed to us, i.e. the mains were brought before we'd finished our appetizers. If we'd wanted fast food we'd have gone to McDonalds!

reviews.author: JosephP
reviews.reviewBody: Drove by this place often, finally decided to try it out.  Good food, because it’s not in a major commercial area, it’s wasn’t too busy for a Friday night.  Good pizza and options.

reviews.author: JudiP
reviews.reviewBody: Consistent high standard of service, product and price. Lovely ambiance, warm , good lighting. We've been with and without kids and have enjoyed it every time

reviews.author: ShirleyD
reviews.reviewBody: We been meaning to try this place forever so we went befor the John mellancamp concert as it was close to the forum. The food and service were amazing, we will be back, even if it’s juts to get pizza to go!

reviews.author: JudiP
reviews.reviewBody:
Lovely little neighbourhood spot, but the price might put a few people off. 
We came with children and the staff were very accommodating. Food was fab.

reviews.author: HeidiH
reviews.reviewBody:
A hidden gem at the top of our street with authentic Italian food, pizzas and delightfully creative meals. Well priced food and wine. Great ambiance and service.
Only one caveat, the homemade bread pudding isn’t served with real whipped cream. Otherwise, everything was great.

reviews.author: DorotheaF
reviews.reviewBody: Friendly and consistent food and service is excellent

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: I spent my birthday at La Piazza and will always remember this experience because it was a very positive one. Katie was a great server and made our visit very personable. Cheers!

reviews.author: DaleW
reviews.reviewBody: Very pleasant. Unobtrusive service.

reviews.author: Linda
reviews.reviewBody: The first time we had dinner here was great, decided to go back and the food was just okay; I understand it may have just been an off night for the kitchen, but compared to the first time it was disappointing.

reviews.author: DebbieO
reviews.reviewBody: We love the food - the pizzas are wonderful thin crust and the appetizers and entrees offer sufficient variety and are always very good.  The staff are friendly and accommodating and while the restaurant can be loud when it is full, it is lovely on evenings with fewer guests. We recommend La Piazza Resto to all of our friends.

reviews.author: Alan
reviews.reviewBody: It was a good meal. Their wood fired oven makes great pizza.

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody:
Wonderful experience! Friendly staff and great service! The food, especially the appetizers were sooo delicious! No complaints from our kids which means a lot..!
...the only suggestion would be to get a new Mojito recipe..! 😉

reviews.author: opentable dinner
reviews.reviewBody: Restaurant was nice and the food was good but I wonder why the only available time for a reserved table was 7:45 pm or later. The restaurant was nearly empty when we arrived for our 7:45 reservation...

reviews.author: Beards
reviews.reviewBody: Great spot for a short or long meal.  Menu was easy to navigate with good options without overwhelming you.  Background noise was minimal making for easy conversation.  Food was tasty and made with fresh ingredients.  I had a pizza that was made with a light flavourful dough...a big differentiator between pizzas, but also sampled the kids starters which were just as good.  Good quality food for any occasion in an atmosphere that feels genuine.  I'll be back.
